    scale-in-out

    @mixin scale-in-out($start-scale: .5, $end-scale: 1) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $start-scale

    The scale to start the animation from.

    		Number.5
    $end-scale

    The scale to end the animation at.

    		Number1

    Requires

    • [mixin] keyframes

    Used by

    • [mixin] igx-checkbox
    • [mixin] igx-radio
    • [mixin] igx-switch
    • [mixin] igx-switch

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    keyframes

    @mixin keyframes($name) { ... }

    Description

    Registers a keyframes animation in the global keyframes registry list.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $name

    The name of the keyframes animation.

    		String— none

    Used by

    • [mixin] bounce-in-top
    • [mixin] bounce-in-right
    • [mixin] bounce-in-bottom
    • [mixin] bounce-in-left
    • [mixin] bounce-in-fwd

    animation

    @mixin animation($animate) { ... }

    Description

    Animates an element.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $animate

    The list of animation properties.

    		List— none

    Example

    Animating an element

    @include fade-in(); // include the 'fade-in' keyframes animation mixin

.bozo {
   @include animation('fade-in' .3s ease-out);
}

    Used by

    • [mixin] igx-carousel
    • [mixin] igx-checkbox
    • [mixin] igx-radio
    • [mixin] igx-switch

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    .8713671191987972
    .8796223968878317
    .8879231178819663
    .8962693533742664
    .9046611743911496
    .9130986517934192
    .9215818562772946
    .9301108583754237
    .938685728457888
    .9473065367331999
    .9559733532492861
    .9646862478944651
    .9734452903984125
    .9822505503331171
    .9911020971138298
    1;

    Description

    This lookup table is needed since there is no pow in SASS. Pre-computed linear color channel values, for use in contrast calculations. See https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/G17.html#G17-tests

    Type

    List

    Example

    Algorithm, for c in 0 to 255:

    f(c) {
  c = c / 255;
  return c < 0.03928 ? c / 12.92 : Math.pow((c + 0.055) / 1.055, 2.4);
}

    Author

    • Google Inc.

    bem

    variables

    bem--sep-elem

    $bem--sep-elem: if(variable-exists(bem--sep-elem), $bem--sep-elem, '__');

    Type

    String - the element separator used. default '__'.

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    bem--sep-mod

    $bem--sep-mod: if(variable-exists(bem--sep-mod), $bem--sep-mod, '--');

    Type

    String - the modifier separator used. default '--'.

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    bem--sep-mod-val

    $bem--sep-mod-val: if(variable-exists(bem--sep-mod-val), $bem--sep-mod-val, '-');

    Type

    String - the modifier value separator used. default '-'.

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    functions

    [private] bem--selector-to-string

    @function bem--selector-to-string($s) { ... }

    Converts a passed selector value into plain string.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $s

    The selector to be converted.

    		String— none

    Returns

    String

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] bem--with-dot

    @function bem--with-dot($x) { ... }

    [private] bem--elem-str

    @function bem--elem-str($b, $e) { ... }

    Description

    Prefixes the block name to an element selector string, with the element separator string used as a divider.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $b

    The block name.

    		String— none
    $e

    The element name.

    		String— none

    Returns

    String

    Example

    Returns

    .block__element

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] bem--bem-str

    @function bem--bem-str($block, $elem, $mod) { ... }

    Description

    Returns a block selector string affixed by the modifier selector, followed by the element selector string.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $block

    The block name.

    		String— none
    $elem

    The sub-element name.

    		String— none
    $mod

    The modifier name.

    		String— none

    Returns

    String

    Example

    Returns

    .block--modifier .block__element

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] bem--contains-elem

    @function bem--contains-elem($x) { ... }

    Description

    Checks if the element separator string is part of the passed string.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $x

    The string to check.

    		String— none

    Returns

    Number or Null —

    Will return the index of the occurance, or null if the element separator name is not part of the passed string.

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] bem--contains-mod

    @function bem--contains-mod($x) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $x

    The string to check.

    		String— none

    Returns

    Number or Null —

    Will return the index of the occurance, or null if the modifier separator string is not part of the passed string.

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] bem--contains-pseudo

    @function bem--contains-pseudo($x) { ... }

    Description

    Checks if the passed selector string contains a colon.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $x

    The string to check for colons.

    		String— none

    Returns

    Number or Null —

    Will return the index of the occurance, or null if the string does not contain any colons.

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] bem--extract-block

    @function bem--extract-block($x) { ... }

    Description

    Returns the BEM block-name that generated $x. Does not include leading ".".

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $x

    The block name.

    		String— none

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] bem--extract-first-selector

    @function bem--extract-first-selector($x) { ... }

    Description

    Returns the first selector of a nested selector string.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $x

    The selector to search for.

    		String— none

    Returns

    String

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    bem-selector

    @function bem-selector($block, $elem, $mod) { ... }

    Description

    Generates a full BEM selector.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $block

    Required. A string block name.

    		String— none
    $elem

    Optional. A sub-element name. If $mod is not present, it is joined with $block. If $mod is present, it is nested under $block--$mod.

    		String or List— none
    $mod

    Optional. A block modifier.

    		String or Map— none

    Example

    Include a block

    @include bem-selector(block); // outputs .block

    Include a block and an element

    @include bem-selector(block, $e:elem); // outputs .block__elem

    Include block, element, and element modifier

    @include bem-selector(block, $e:(elem,emod); // outputs .block__elem-emod

    Include block and block modifier

    @include bem-selector(block, $m:mod) // outputs .block--mod

    Include block and modifier value

    @include bem-selector(block, $m:(mod:val)); // outputs .block--mod-val

    Include block modifier followed by block sub-element

    @include bem-selector(block, $m:mod, $e:elem); // outputs .block--mod .block__elem

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    mixins

    bem-block

    @mixin bem-block($block) { ... }

    Description

    Simply unrolls into a class-selector. The main purpose of using this mixin is to clearly denote the start of a BEM block.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $block

    The block name.

    		String— none

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    bem-elem

    @mixin bem-elem($elem, $m, $mod) { ... }

    Description

    Unrolls into a proper BEM element selector, depending on the context. Inside just a block, yields a root-level .block__elem. Inside a mod or pseudo-selector, yields a nested .block--mod .block__elem. If $mod is included, it is appended to the block selector. Multiple $mods are not supported.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $elem

    The sub-element name.

    		String— none
    $m

    The modifier name.

    		String— none
    $mod

    An alias of $m.

    		String— none

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    bem-mod

    @mixin bem-mod($mod) { ... }

    Description

    Unrolls into a BEM block-modifier selector. This mixin does not generate element-modifiers, the bem-elem mixin instead. Nesting bem-mod inside a pseudo-selector is not supported, because what that should mean isn't clear.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $mod

    The modifier name.

    		String— none

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    bem-mods

    @mixin bem-mods($mods) { ... }

    Description

    Unrolls into a block--modifier.[block--modifier...] .block__el This mixin is useful when we want to apply classes to a block, or block element when two or more modifiers are applied in tandem

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $mods

    A list of modifiers

    		List— none

    Authors

    • Juan Patten

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    elevations

    functions

    [private] _l1-shadows

    @function _l1-shadows($color) { ... }

    Description

    Level 1 - Umbra Shadows

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $color

    The color used to generate umbra shadows.

    		Color— none

    Returns

    Map —

    Returns a map of 24 shadow elevations with the umbra color.

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    		Color— none

    Returns

    [private] _elevation

    @function _elevation($elevation, $l1-color, $l2-color, $l3-color) { ... }

    Description

    Returns shadow based on elevation, umbra, penumbra, and ambient shadow colors.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $elevation

    The elevation level to generate a shadow for.

    		Number— none
    $l1-color

    The umbra color.

    		Color— none
    $l2-color

    The penumbra color.

    		Color— none
    $l3-color

    The ambient color.

    		Color— none

    Returns

    String —

    A string to be used as box-shadow value.

    Used by

    • [function] igx-elevations

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-elevation

    @function igx-elevation($elevations, $elevation) { ... }

    Description

    Returns an igx elevation from an igx-elevations produced map.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $elevations

    The igx-elevations map to extract the elevation from.

    		Map— none
    $elevation

    The elevation level from 1 to 24.

    		Number— none

    Returns

    String —

    Returns a box-shadow value.

    Used by

    variables

    elevations

    $elevations: igx-elevations(
    rgba(0, 0, 0, .26),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, .12),
    rgba(0, 0, 0, .08)
) !default;

    Description

    Default elevations. Work in progress. Subject to change.

    Type

    Map

    Map structure

    Map key NameMap key DescriptionMap key TypeMap key Value
    $color-1

    The color used for the umbra shadow.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .26)
    $color-2

    The color used for the penumbra shadow.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .12)
    $color-3

    The color used for the ambient shadow.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .08)

    palettes

    functions

    [private] gen-color

    @function gen-color($color, $saturation) { ... }

    Description

    Generates a color shade from base color and saturation level.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $color

    The base color to be used to generate a color shade.

    		Color— none
    $saturation

    The saturation level used to create the color shade.

    		Number or String— none

    Used by

    • [function] generate-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-color

    @function igx-color($palette, $color, $variant: 500) { ... }

    Description

    Retrieves a color from a color palette.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The source palette map.

    		Map— none
    $color

    The target color from the color palette.

    		String— none
    $variant

    The target color shade from the color palette.

    		Number or String500

    Returns

    Color —

    White if no palette, color, and variant matches found.

    Used by

    • [function] igx-contrast-color
    • [variable] overlay-color
    • [mixin] igx-badge
    • [mixin] igx-bottom-nav
    • [mixin] igx-button-group
    • [mixin] igx-carousel
    • [mixin] igx-grid-toolbar
    • [mixin] _excel-filtering
    • [mixin] igx-grid

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-contrast-color

    @function igx-contrast-color($palette, $color, $variant) { ... }

    Description

    Retrieves a contrast text color for a given color from a color palette.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The source palette map.

    		Map— none
    $color

    The target color from the color palette.

    		String— none
    $variant

    The target color shade from the color palette.

    		Number or Variant— none

    Returns

    Color —

    [#fff] - Returns white if now palette, color and/or variant matches found.

    Requires

    • [function] igx-color
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] hexrgba

    Used by

    • [mixin] igx-grid

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    text-contrast

    @function text-contrast($color) { ... }

    Description

    Returns a contrast color for a passed color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $color

    The color used to return a contrast color for.

    		Color— none

    Returns

    Color —

    Returns either white or black depending on the luminance of the input color.

    Used by

    • [function] igx-contrast-color
    • [function] generate-palette

    [private] generate-palette

    @function generate-palette($color, $saturations) { ... }

    Description

    Generates a Material-like color palette for a single color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $color

    The base color used to generate the palette.

    		Color— none
    $saturations

    The saturation list of color variants. Based on the Material color system.

    		List— none

    Returns

    Map —

    A map consisting of 14 color variations and 14 text contrast colors for each variation.

    Requires

    • [function] gen-color
    • [function] text-contrast

    Used by

    • [function] igx-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] grayscale-palette

    @function grayscale-palette($color, $shades) { ... }

    Description

    Generates grayscale color palette from a color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $color

    The base color used to generate the palette.

    		Color— none
    $shades

    A map of variations as keys and opacities as values. Based on the Material color system.

    		Map— none

    Returns

    Map —

    A map consisting of 10 grayscale color variations and 10 text contrast colors for each variation.

    Requires

    • [function] text-contrast

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-palette

    @function igx-palette($primary, $secondary, $info: #1377d5, $success: #4eb862, $warn: #fbb13c, $error: #ff134a, $grays: #000, $surface: #fff) { ... }

    Description

    Generates a color palette.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary

    The primary color used to generate the primary color palette.

    		Color— none
    $secondary

    The secondary color used to generate the secondary color palette.

    		Color— none
    $info

    The information color used throughout the application.

    		Color#1377d5
    $success

    The success color used throughout the application.

    		Color#4eb862
    $warn

    The warning color used throughout the application.

    		Color#fbb13c
    $error

    The error color used throughout the application.

    		Color#ff134a
    $grays

    The color used for generating the grayscale palette.

    		Color#000
    $surface

    The color used as a background in components, such as cards, sheets, and menus.

    		Color#fff

    Returns

    Map —

    A map consisting of 74 color variations, including the primary, secondary, grays, info, success, warn, and error colors.

    Requires

    • [function] generate-palette

    Used by

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    variables

    default-palette

    $default-palette: igx-palette($primary: #09f, $secondary: #e41c77) !default;

    Description

    Default theme palette. Will be the one used if no theme palette is specified.

    Type

    Map

    Map structure

    Map key NameMap key DescriptionMap key TypeMap key Value
    primary

    The primary sub-palette created from the primary color.

    		Map— none
    secondary

    The secondary sub-palette created from the secondary color.

    		Map— none
    grays

    The grays sub-palette. Included by default in every igx-palette.

    		Map— none
    primary.100

    The 100 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#a7d9fa
    primary.200

    The 200 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#6dbcf1
    primary.300

    The 300 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#3ca9f2
    primary.400

    The 400 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#1da0f7
    primary.500

    The 500 variant of the primary color (default).

    		Color#09f
    primary.600

    The 600 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#0089e5
    primary.700

    The 700 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#007ed2
    primary.800

    The 800 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#0072be
    primary.900

    The 900 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#0065a8
    primary.A100

    The A100 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#55bbff
    primary.A200

    The A200 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#27a9ff
    primary.A400

    The A400 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#008deb
    primary.A700

    The A700 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#0066aa
    secondary.100

    The 100 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#f0b2ce
    secondary.200

    The 200 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#e17fab
    secondary.300

    The 300 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#dc5391
    secondary.400

    The 400 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#df3683
    secondary.500

    The 500 variant of the secondary color (default).

    		Color#e41c77
    secondary.600

    The 600 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#dc0a6a
    secondary.700

    The 700 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#d30060
    secondary.800

    The 800 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#bf0057
    secondary.900

    The 900 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#a5044d
    secondary.A100

    The A100 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#f65fa4
    secondary.A200

    The A200 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#f3348b
    secondary.A400

    The A400 variant of the secondary color.

    		Color#df0d6d
    secondary.A700

    The A700 variant of the primary color.

    		Color#a2094f
    grays.100

    The 100 variant of the grays color.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .04)
    grays.200

    The 200 variant of the grays color.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .08)
    grays.300

    The 300 variant of the grays color.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .12)
    grays.400

    The 400 variant of the grays color.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .26)
    grays.500

    The 500 variant of the grays color.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .38)
    grays.600

    The 600 variant of the grays color.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .54)
    grays.700

    The 700 variant of the grays color.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .62)
    grays.800

    The 800 variant of the grays color.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .74)
    grays.900

    The 900 variant of the grays color.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .87)
    info

    The info color. Default for every palette if not specified.

    		Color#1377d5
    success

    The success color. Default for every palette if not specified.

    		Color#4eb862
    warn

    The warn color. Default for every palette if not specified.

    		Color#fbb13c
    error

    The error. Default for every palette if not specified.

    		Color#ff134a

    Requires

    • [function] igx-palette

    Used by

    • [function] igx-avatar-theme
    • [function] igx-badge-theme
    • [function] igx-banner-theme
    • [function] igx-bottom-nav-theme
    • [function] igx-button-group-theme
    • [function] igx-button-theme
    • [function] igx-calendar-theme
    • [function] igx-card-theme
    • [function] igx-carousel-theme
    • [function] igx-checkbox-theme
    • [function] igx-chip-theme
    • [function] igx-column-hiding-theme
    • [function] igx-combo-theme
    • [function] igx-dialog-theme
    • [function] igx-divider-theme
    • [function] igx-drop-down-theme
    • [function] igx-expansion-panel-theme
    • [function] igx-grid-paginator-theme
    • [function] igx-grid-summary-theme
    • [function] igx-grid-toolbar-theme
    • [function] igx-grid-theme
    • [function] igx-icon-theme
    • [function] igx-input-group-theme
    • [function] igx-list-theme
    • [function] igx-navbar-theme
    • [function] igx-navdrawer-theme

    overlay-color

    $overlay-color: igx-color($default-palette, 'grays') !default;

    Description

    Global Overlay Color

    Type

    Color

    Map structure

    Color key NameColor key DescriptionColor key TypeColor key Value
    $palette

    The palette used to extract the color from.

    		Map$default-palette
    $color

    The name of the sub-palette to take the color from.

    		Stringgrays

    Requires

    • [function] igx-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] igx-navdrawer

    background: #222

    [private] _dark-button-group

    $_dark-button-group: extend($_light-button-group, (
    item-background: #222
));

    Description

    Generates a dark button group schema.

    Type

    [private] _dark-button

    $_dark-button: extend($_light-button, (
    flat-hover-background: (
        igx-color: ('secondary', 500),
        rgba: .12
    ),

    flat-focus-background: (
        igx-color: ('secondary', 400),
        rgba: .24
    ),

    icon-hover-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 300)
    ),

    disabled-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 200)
    )
));

    Description

    Generates a dark button schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    flat-hover-background

    The hover background color of a flat button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500), rgba: .12
    flat-focus-background

    The focus background color of a flat button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 400), rgba: .24
    icon-hover-background

    The hover background color of an icon button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300)
    disabled-background

    The disabled background color of raised, fab, or icon buttons.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)

    Requires

    • [function] extend
    • [variable] _light-button

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _dark-chip

    $_dark-chip: extend($_light-chip, (
    ghost-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 400),
        hexrgba: #000
    )

    Description

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400), hexrgba: #000

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    [private] _dark-grid

    $_dark-grid: extend($_light-grid, (
    header-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 100),
        hexrgba: #222
    ),

    content-background: #222,

    row-odd-background: #222,

    row-even-background: #222,

    row-hover-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 100),
        hexrgba: #222
    ),

    row-hover-text-color: #fff,

    row-selected-background: (
        igx-color: ('secondary', 500),
        rgba: .24,
        hexrgba: #222
    ),

    row-selected-text-color: #fff,

    ghost-header-background: #222,

    cell-editing-background: #222,

    cell-selected-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 200),
        hexrgba: #222
    ),

    grouparea-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 100),
        hexrgba: #222
    ),

    group-row-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 100),
        hexrgba: #222
    ),

    group-row-selected-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 200),
        hexrgba: #222
    ),

    filtering-header-background: #222,

    filtering-row-background: #222,

    cell-selected-text-color: #fff,

    body-summaries-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 100),
        hexrgba: #222
    ),

    body-summaries-text-color: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 100),
        hexrgba: #222,
        text-contrast: ()
    ),

    root-summaries-background: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 300),
        hexrgba: #222
    ),

    root-summaries-text-color: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 300),
        hexrgba: #222,
        text-contrast: ()
    ),

    row-highlight: (
        igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    ),

    row-ghost-background: (
        igx-color: ('primary', 900)
    )
));

    Description

    Generates a dark grid schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    header-background

    The table header background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #222
    content-background

    The table body background color.

    		Color#222
    row-odd-background

    The background color of odd rows.

    		Color#222
    row-even-background

    The background color of even rows.

    		Color#222
    row-hover-background

    The hover row background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #222
    row-selected-background

    The selected row background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500), rgba: .24, hexrgba: #222
    row-selected-text-color

    The selected row text color.

    		Color#fff
    ghost-header-background

    The dragged header background color.

    		Color#222
    cell-editing-background

    The background for the cell in editing mode.

    		Color#222
    cell-selected-background

    The selected cell background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200), hexrgba: #222
    cell-selected-text-color

    The selected cell text color.

    		Map#fff
    grouparea-background

    The grid group area background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #222
    group-row-background

    The grid group row background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #222
    group-row-selected-background

    The drop area background on drop color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200), hexrgba: #222
    filtering-header-background

    The background color of the filtered column header.

    		Color#222
    filtering-row-background

    The background color of the filtering row.

    		Color#222
    body-summaries-background

    The background color of the summary groups located the body.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300), hexrgba: #222
    body-summaries-text-color

    The text color of the summary groups located the body.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300), hexrgba: #222, text-contrast: ()
    root-summaries-background

    The background color of the summary groups located the footer.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #222
    root-summaries-text-color

    The text color of the summary groups located the footer.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #222, text-contrast: ()

    Requires

    • [function] extend
    • [variable] _light-grid

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _dark-icon

    $_dark-icon: extend($_light-icon, ());

    Description

    Generates a dark icon schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Requires

    • [function] extend
    • [variable] _light-icon

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    dark-schema

    $dark-schema: (
    igx-avatar: $_dark-avatar,
    igx-badge: $_dark-badge,
    igx-banner: $_dark-banner,
    igx-bottom-nav: $_dark-bottom-nav,
    igx-button: $_dark-button,
    igx-button-group: $_dark-button-group,
    igx-calendar: $_dark-calendar,
    igx-card: $_dark-card,
    igx-carousel: $_dark-carousel,
    igx-checkbox: $_dark-checkbox,
    igx-chip: $_dark-chip,
    igx-column-hiding: $_dark-column-hiding,
    igx-combo: $_dark-combo,
    igx-dialog: $_dark-dialog,
    igx-divider: $_dark-divider,
    igx-drop-down: $_dark-drop-down,
    igx-expansion-panel: $_dark-expansion-panel,
    igx-grid: $_dark-grid,
    igx-grid-filtering: $_dark-grid-filtering,
    igx-grid-paginator: $_dark-grid-pagination,
    igx-grid-summary: $_dark-grid-summary,
    igx-grid-toolbar: $_dark-grid-toolbar,
    igx-icon: $_dark-icon,
    igx-input-group: $_dark-input-group,
    igx-list: $_dark-list,
    igx-navbar: $_dark-navbar,
    igx-navdrawer: $_dark-navdrawer,
    igx-overlay: $_dark-overlay,
    igx-linear-bar: $_dark-progress-linear,
    igx-circular-bar: $_dark-progress-circular,
    igx-radio: $_dark-radio,
    igx-ripple: $_dark-ripple,
    igx-slider: $_dark-slider,
    igx-snackbar: $_dark-snackbar,
    igx-switch: $_dark-switch,
    igx-tabs: $_dark-tabs,
    igx-time-picker: $_dark-time-picker,
    igx-toast: $_dark-toast,
    igx-tooltip: $_dark-tooltip
);

    Description

    The default dark schema for all components.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    igx-avatar— noneMap$_dark-avatar
    igx-badge— noneMap$_dark-badge
    igx-banner— noneMap$_dark-banner
    igx-bottom-nav— noneMap$_dark-bottom-nav
    igx-button— noneMap$_dark-button
    igx-button-group— noneMap$_dark-button-group
    igx-calendar— noneMap$_dark-calendar
    igx-card— noneMap$_dark-card
    igx-carousel— noneMap$_dark-carousel
    igx-checkbox— noneMap$_dark-checkbox
    igx-chip— noneMap$_dark-chip
    igx-column-hiding— noneMap$_dark-column-hiding
    igx-combo— noneMap$_dark-combo
    igx-dialog— noneMap$_dark-dialog
    igx-divider— noneMap$_dark-divider
    igx-drop-down— noneMap$_dark-drop-down
    igx-expansion-panel— noneMap$_dark-expansion-panel
    igx-grid— noneMap$_dark-grid
    igx-grid-filtering— noneMap$_dark-grid-filtering
    igx-grid-paginator— noneMap$_dark-grid-pagination
    igx-grid-summary— noneMap$_dark-grid-summary
    igx-grid-toolbar— noneMap$_dark-grid-toolbar
    igx-icon— noneMap$_dark-icon
    igx-input-group— noneMap$_dark-input-group
    igx-list— noneMap$_dark-list
    igx-navbar— noneMap$_dark-navbar
    igx-navdrawer— noneMap$_dark-navdrawer
    igx-overlay— noneMap$_dark-overlay
    igx-progress-linear— noneMap$_dark-progress-linear
    igx-progress-circular— noneMap$_dark-progress-circular
    igx-radio— noneMap$_dark-radio
    igx-ripple— noneMap$_dark-ripple
    igx-slider— noneMap$_dark-slider
    igx-snackbar— noneMap$_dark-snackbar
    igx-switch— noneMap$_dark-switch
    igx-tabs— noneMap$_dark-tabs
    igx-time-picker— noneMap$_dark-time-picker
    igx-toast— noneMap$_dark-toast
    igx-tooltip— noneMap$_dark-tooltip

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _dark-input-group

    $_dark-input-group: extend($_light-input-group, (
    search-background: #222
));

    Description

    Generates a light input-group schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    search-background

    The background color of an input group of type search.

    		Color#222

    Requires

    • [function] extend
    • [variable] _light-input-group

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    [private] _dark-list

    $_dark-list: extend($_light-list, (
    item-background-hover: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 400),
        hexrgba: (#000)
    ),

    item-background-active: (
        igx-color: ('grays', 400),
        hexrgba: (#000)
    ),
));

    Description

    Generates a dark list schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    item-background-hover

    The list item hover background.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400), hexrgba: (#000)
    item-background-active

    The active list item background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400), hexrgba: (#000)

    Requires

    • [function] extend
    • [variable] _light-list

    • [variable] default-palette

    [private] _light-avatar

    $_light-avatar: extend(
    $_default-shape-avatar,
    (
        icon-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        initials-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        initials-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        image-background: transparent
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light avatar schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    icon-background

    The background color used for avatars of type icon.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    icon-color

    The icon color used for avatars of type icon.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    initials-background

    The background color used for avatars of type initials.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    initials-color

    The text color used for avatars of type initials.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    image-background

    The background color used for avatars of type image.

    		Colortransparent

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-avatar

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _light-badge

    $_light-badge: extend(
    $_default-shape-badge,
    $_default-elevation-badge,
    (
        icon-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        border-color: #fff,

        background-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light badge schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    icon-color

    The icon color used.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('primary', 500)
    text-color

    The text color used.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('primary', 500)
    border-color

    The border color used.

    		Color#fff
    background-color

    The background color used.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the badge shadow.

    		Number1
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for badge component.

    		Number1

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-badge

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _light-banner

    $_light-banner: extend(
    $_default-shape-banner,
    (
        banner-background: (
            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),

        banner-message-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .87
        ),

        banner-border-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        banner-illustration-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .87
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light banner schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    banner-background

    The background color used banner background.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface'
    banner-message-color

    The color used for banner label.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .87
    banner-border-color

    The border color used banner border.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    banner-illustration-background

    The background color used for banner illustration.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    banner-illustration-color

    The color used banner illustration.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .87

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-banner

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    [private] _light-bottom-nav

    $_light-bottom-nav: extend(
    $_default-shape-bottom-nav,
    $_default-elevation-bottom-nav,
    (
        background: #fff,

        idle-item-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        active-item-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light bottom navigation scheme.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    background

    The background color used for the toast.

    		Color#fff
    idle-item-color

    The text-color used for the idle color.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 700)
    active-item-color

    The text-color used for the active color.

    		Colorigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    elevation

    The elevation level of the bar.

    		Number8

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-bottom-nav

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _light-button-group

    $_light-button-group: extend(
    $_default-shape-button-group,
    $_default-elevation-button-group,
    (
        item-background: #fff,

        item-border-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        item-disabled-border: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        item-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        item-hover-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        item-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        item-selected-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        item-selected-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        item-selected-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500)
        ),

        item-selected-border-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        disabled-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        disabled-background-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 50)
        ),
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light button group schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    item-text-color

    The text color for button group items.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 700)
    item-background

    The background color for button group items .

    		Color#fff
    item-border-color

    The border color between button group items.

    		Colortransparent
    item-hover-text-color

    The hover text color for button group items.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    item-hover-background

    The hover background color for button group items.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    disabled-text-color

    The text/icon color for a disabled item in the button group.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    disabled-background-color

    The background color for a disabled item in the button group.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    item-selected-text-color

    The text color for a selected item in the button group.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    item-selected-background

    The background color for a selected item in the button group.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    item-selected-border-color

    The border color for a selected item from the button group.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 600), rgba: .12
    item-selected-hover-background

    The background color for a selected item in hover or focus state in the button group.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 500)
    elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the badge shadow.

    		Number2
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for button-group component.

    		Number.2

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-button-group

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _light-button

    $_light-button: extend(
    $_default-shape-button,
    $_default-elevation-button,
    (
        flat-background: transparent,

        flat-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        flat-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500),
            rgba: .05
        ),

        flat-hover-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        flat-focus-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 400),
            rgba: .12
        ),

        flat-focus-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        outlined-background: transparent,

        outlined-outline-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        outlined-disabled-outline-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        outlined-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        outlined-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500),
            rgba: .05
        ),

        outlined-hover-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        outlined-focus-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 400),
            rgba: .12
        ),

        outlined-focus-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        raised-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        raised-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        raised-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 300)
        ),


        raised-hover-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 300)
        ),

        raised-focus-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 300)
        ),

        raised-focus-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 300)
        ),

        fab-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        fab-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        fab-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 300)
        ),

        fab-hover-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 300)
        ),

        fab-focus-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 300)
        ),

        fab-focus-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 300)
        ),

        icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        icon-background: transparent,

        icon-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        ),

        icon-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        icon-focus-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        icon-focus-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        disabled-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        disabled-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light button schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    button-roundness

    The edge roundness (border-radius) for flat and raised buttons.

    		String4px
    flat-background

    The background color of a flat button.

    		Colortransparent
    flat-text-color

    The idle text color of a flat button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    flat-hover-background

    The hover background color of a flat button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500), rgba: .05
    flat-hover-text-color

    The hover text color of a flat button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    flat-focus-background

    The focus background color of a flat button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 400), rgba: .12
    flat-focus-text-color

    The focus text color of a flat button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    outlined-text-color

    The idle text color of an outlined button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    outlined-outline-color

    The border color of an outlined button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300)
    outlined-disabled-outline-color

    The border color of an outlined button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300)
    outlined-hover-background

    The hover background color of an outlined button.

    		Colortransparent
    outlined-hover-text-color

    The hover text color of an outlined button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    outlined-focus-background

    The focus background color of an outlined button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 400), rgba: .12
    outlined-focus-text-color

    The focus text color of an outlined button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    raised-background

    The background color of an raised button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    raised-text-color

    The idle text color of a raised button.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
    raised-hover-background

    The hover background of a raised button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 300)
    raised-hover-text-color

    The hover text color of a raised button.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 300)
    raised-focus-background

    The focus background color of a raised button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 300)
    raised-focus-text-color

    The focus text color of a raised button.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 300)
    fab-background

    The background color of a floating action button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    fab-text-color

    The text color of a floating action button.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
    fab-hover-background

    The hover background color of a floating action button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 300)
    fab-hover-text-color

    The hover text color of a floating action button.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 300)
    fab-focus-background

    The focus background color of floating action button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 300)
    fab-focus-text-color

    The focus text color of a floating action button.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 300)
    icon-color

    The icon color of an icon button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    icon-hover-color

    The hover icon color of an icon button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    icon-background

    The background color of the an icon button.

    		Colortransparent
    icon-hover-background

    The hover background color of an icon button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    icon-focus-color

    The focus icon color of an icon button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    icon-focus-background

    The focus background color an icon button.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400
    disabled-color

    The disabled text/icon color of a button.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    disabled-background

    The disabled background color of raised, fab, or icon buttons.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    raised-resting-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the resting state.

    		Number2
    raised-hover-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the hover state.

    		Number4
    raised-focus-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the focus state.

    		Number8
    fab-resting-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the resting state.

    		Number6
    fab-hover-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the hover state.

    		Number12
    fab-focus-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the focus state.

    		Number12
    flat-border-radius

    The border radius fraction used for flat button.

    		Number.2
    raised-border-radius

    The border radius fraction used for raised button.

    		Number.2
    outlined-border-radius

    The border radius fraction used for outlined button.

    		Number1
    fab-border-radius

    The border radius fraction used for fab button.

    		Number1
    icon-border-radius

    The border radius fraction used for icon button.

    		Number1

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-button

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _light-calendar

    $_light-calendar: extend(
    $_default-shape-calendar,
    (
        content-background: (
            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),

        content-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .87
        ),

        header-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        header-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        picker-arrow-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .74
        ),

        picker-arrow-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        picker-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .74
        ),

        picker-text-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        inactive-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .26
        ),

        weekend-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .38
        ),

        year-current-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        month-current-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        year-hover-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        month-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),

        month-hover-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: ()
        ),

        date-selected-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        date-selected-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        date-current-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        date-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),

        date-special-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        ),

        date-special-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 900)
        ),

        date-disabled-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500),
            hexrgba: (),
            rgba: .6
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light calendar schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    content-background

    The main content background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface'
    content-text-color

    The main content text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .87
    header-background

    The header background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    header-text-color

    The header text color.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
    picker-arrow-color

    The idle picker arrow color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .74
    picker-arrow-hover-color

    The picker hover arrow color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    picker-text-color

    The idle picker month/year color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .74
    picker-text-hover-color

    The hover picker month/year color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    inactive-text-color

    The text color for weekday labels and other month dates.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .26
    weekend-text-color

    The text color for weekend days.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .38
    year-current-text-color

    The text color for the current/selected year.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    month-current-text-color

    The text color for the current/selected month.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    year-hover-text-color

    The year hover text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    month-hover-text-color

    The month hover text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: ()
    month-hover-background

    The month hover text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)
    date-selected-background

    The background color for the selected date.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    date-selected-text-color

    The text color for the selected date.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
    date-current-text-color

    The text color for the current date.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    date-hover-background

    The hover date background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)
    date-special-background

    The background color used for special dates.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    date-special-text-color

    The text color used for special dates.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 900)
    date-disabled-text-color

    The text color for disabled dates.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500), hexrgba: (), rgba: .6
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for calendar.

    		Number1
    date-border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for calendar.

    		Number1
    month-border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for calendar.

    		Number1

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-calendar

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _light-card

    $_light-card: extend(
    $_default-shape-card,
    $_default-elevation-card,
    (
        background: (
            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),

        header-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .87
        ),

        subtitle-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .6
        ),

        content-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .6
        ),

        actions-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .6
        ),

        outline-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light card schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    background

    The card background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface'
    header-text-color

    The text color of the card title.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .87
    subtitle-text-color

    The text color of the card subtitle.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .6
    content-text-color

    The text color of the card content.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .6
    actions-text-color

    The text color of the card buttons.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .6
    resting-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the resting state.

    		Number2
    hover-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the hover state.

    		Number8
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for card date.

    		Number.17
    outline-color

    The outline color of an outlined type card.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)

    [private] _light-carousel

    $_light-carousel: extend(
    $_default-shape-carousel,
    (
        button-background: #fff,
        button-hover-background: #fff,

        button-arrow-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        button-hover-arrow-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 900)
        ),

        indicator-dot-color: #fff,
        indicator-border-color: #fff,
        indicator-active-border-color: #fff
    )
);

    Description

    Map structure

    		Color#fff
    button-hover-background

    The previous/next buttons hover background color.

    		Color#fff
    button-arrow-color

    The previous/next buttons idle arrow color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700)
    button-hover-arrow-color

    The previous/next buttons hover arrow color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 900)
    indicator-dot-color

    The active indicator dot color.

    		Color#fff
    indicator-border-color

    The idle indicator border color.

    		Color#fff
    indicator-active-border-color

    The active indicator border color.

    		Color#fff

    		Number0

    [private] _light-checkbox

    $_light-checkbox: extend(
    $_default-shape-checkbox,
    (
        tick-color: #fff,

        label-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 900)
        ),

        empty-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        fill-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        disabled-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        )
    )
);

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value

    		Color#fff

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 900)
    empty-color

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    fill-color

    The checked border and fill colors.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    disabled-color

    The disabled border and fill colors.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-10 to be used for checkbox.

    		Number.2
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-24 to be used for checkbox ripple.

    		Number1

    [private] _light-chip

    $_light-chip: extend(
    $_default-shape-chip,
    (
        text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),

        border-color: transparent,

        ghost-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        hover-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        hover-border-color: transparent,

        focus-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        focus-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        focus-border-color: transparent,

        selected-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        selected-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        selected-border-color: transparent,

        hover-selected-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        hover-selected-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        hover-selected-border-color: transparent,

        focus-selected-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        focus-selected-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        focus-selected-border-color: transparent
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light chip schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for chip component.

    		Number1
    text-color

    The chip text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700)
    background

    The chip background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)
    border-color

    The chip border color.

    		Colortransparent
    ghost-background

    The chip ghost background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400), hexrgba: #fff)
    hover-text-color

    The chip text hover color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700)
    hover-background

    The chip hover background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300)
    hover-border-color

    The chip hover border color.

    		Colortransparent
    selected-text-color

    The selected chip text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700)
    selected-background

    The selected chip background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300)
    selected-border-color

    The selected chip border color.

    		Colortransparent
    hover-selected-text-color

    The selected chip hover text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700)
    hover-selected-background

    The selected chip hover background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    hover-selected-border-color

    The selected chip hover border color.

    		Maptransparent
    focus-selected-text-color

    The selected chip text focus color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700)
    focus-selected-background

    The selected chip focus background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    focus-selected-border-color

    The selected chip focus border color.

    		Maptransparent

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-chip

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _light-column-hiding

            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),

        search-separator-border-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            hexrgba: (),
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .12
        ),

        empty-list-placeholder-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',

            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .26

    )
);

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface'
    search-separator-border-color

    The combo search box separator color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', hexrgba: (), text-contrast: (), rgba: .12
    empty-list-placeholder-color

    The combo placeholder text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', hexrgba: (), text-contrast: (), rgba: .26

    [private] _light-dialog

    $_light-dialog: extend(
    $_default-shape-dialog,
    $_default-elevation-dialog,
    (
        background: (
            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),

        title-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .87
        ),

        message-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .6
        ),
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light dialog schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    background

    The dialog background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface'
    title-color

    The dialog title text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .87
    message-color

    The dialog message text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .6
    elevation

    The elevation level for the dialog.

    		Number24
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for dialog component.

    		Number.1

    [private] _light-drop-down

    $_light-drop-down: extend(
    $_default-shape-drop-down,
    $_default-elevation-drop-down,
    (
        background-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),

        header-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        item-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .74
        ),

        hover-item-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .74
        ),

        hover-item-background: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .04
        ),

        focused-item-background: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .04
        ),

        focused-item-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .74
        ),

        selected-item-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 100),
        ),

        selected-item-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 100)
        ),

        selected-hover-item-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 200),
        ),

        selected-hover-item-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 200)
        ),

        selected-focus-item-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 200),
        ),

        selected-focus-item-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 200)
        ),

        disabled-item-background: transparent,

        disabled-item-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .38
        ),
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light drop-down schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    background-color

    The drop-down background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface'
    header-text-color

    The drop-down header text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    item-text-color

    The drop-down text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .74
    hover-item-text-color

    The drop-down hover text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .74
    hover-item-background

    The drop-down hover item background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .04
    focused-item-background

    The drop-down focused item background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .04
    focused-item-text-color

    The drop-down focused item text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .74
    selected-item-background

    The drop-down selected item background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 100)
    selected-item-text-color

    The drop-down selected item text color.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 100)
    selected-hover-item-background

    The drop-down selected item hover background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 200)
    selected-hover-item-text-color

    The drop-down selected item hover text color.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 200)
    selected-focus-item-background

    The drop-down selected item focus background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 200)
    selected-focus-item-text-color

    The drop-down selected item focus text color.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 200)
    disabled-item-background

    The drop-down disabled item background color.

    		Colortransparent
    disabled-item-text-color

    The drop-down disabled item text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .38
    elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the badge shadow.

    		Number8
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for drop-down component.

    		Number.2

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-drop-down

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

            igx-color: ('grays', 100)

            igx-color: ('grays', 800)

            igx-color: ('grays', 500)
        )
    )
);

    		Color#fff
    body-background

    		Color#fff

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    body-color

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    disabled-color

    The panel disabled text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500)

    [private] _light-grid-filtering

    $_light-grid-filtering: extend(
    $_default-shape-grid-filtering,
    (
        menu-background: #fff,
        toggle-background: transparent,
        toggle-filtered-background: transparent,
        toggle-icon-color: inherit,
        toggle-icon-hover-color: #fff,
        menu-button-disabled-text-color: initial,

        toggle-icon-active-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500),
        ),

        toggle-icon-filtered-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        toggle-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        toggle-active-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        menu-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 900)
        ),

        menu-button-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        )
    )
);

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value

    The idle menu background color.

    		Color#fff
    toggle-background

    The idle toggle background color.

    		Colortransparent
    toggle-filtered-background

    The filtered toggle background color.

    		Colortransparent
    toggle-icon-color

    The idle toggle icon color.

    		Colorinherit
    toggle-icon-hover-color

    The hover toggle icon color.

    		Color#fff
    menu-button-disabled-text-color

    The menu disabled button text color.

    		Colorinitial
    toggle-icon-active-color

    The active toggle icon color.

    		Colorigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
    toggle-icon-filtered-color

    The filtered toggle icon color.

    		Colorigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    toggle-hover-background

    The hover toggle background color.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 300)
    toggle-active-background

    The active toggle background color.

    		Colorigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    menu-text-color

    The idle menu text color.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 900)
    menu-button-text-color

    		Colorigx-color: ('secondary', 500)

    [private] _light-grid-summary

    $_light-grid-summary: extend(
    $_default-shape-grid-summary,
    (
        background-color: inherit,

        focus-background-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        ),

        label-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        result-color: currentColor,
        border-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        pinned-border-width: 2px,
        pinned-border-style: solid,
        pinned-border-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        label-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 700)
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light grid-summary schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    background-color

    The summaries background color is inherited form igx-grid__tfoot.

    		Colorinherit
    focus-background-color

    The background color when a summary item is on focus.

    		Colorigx-color
    label-color

    The summaries label color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    result-color

    The summaries value/result color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    border-color

    The summaries border color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    pinned-border-width

    The border width of the summary panel.

    		String2px
    pinned-border-style

    The border style of the summary panel.

    		Stringsolid
    pinned-border-color

    The border color of the summary panel.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    label-hover-color

    The summaries hover label color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 700)

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-grid-summary

    • [variable] default-palette
