    [private] _light-grid

    $_light-grid: extend(
    $_default-shape-grid,
    $_default-elevation-grid,
    (
        header-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        header-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        sortable-header-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 900)
        ),

        sortable-header-hover-icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500)
        ),

        sortable-header-icon-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        sorted-header-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 900)
        ),

        sorted-header-icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        header-border-width: 1px,
        header-border-style: solid,

        header-border-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),

        content-background: #fff,
        content-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        ghost-header-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        ghost-header-icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500)
        ),

        ghost-header-background: #fff,

        row-odd-background: #fff,
        row-even-background: #fff,
        row-odd-text-color: inherit,
        row-even-text-color: inherit,

        row-selected-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 50),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        row-selected-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 50)
        ),

        row-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        row-hover-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),
        row-border-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        pinned-border-width: 2px,
        pinned-border-style: solid,

        pinned-border-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        cell-active-border-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        cell-selected-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        cell-selected-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),

        cell-editing-background: #fff,

        edit-mode-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        edited-row-indicator: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),

        cell-edited-value-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        resize-line-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        drop-indicator-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        grouparea-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        group-label-column-name-text: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        group-label-icon: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        group-label-text: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        expand-all-icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        expand-all-icon-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        expand-icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        expand-icon-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        active-expand-icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500)
        ),

        active-expand-icon-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        group-count-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),

        group-count-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        drop-area-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        drop-area-icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500),
            hexrgba: ()
        ),

        drop-area-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        ),

        drop-area-on-drop-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),

        group-row-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        group-row-selected-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        filtering-header-background: #fff,

        filtering-header-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        filtering-row-background: #fff,

        filtering-row-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 800)
        ),

        tree-filtered-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500)
        ),

        body-summaries-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        body-summaries-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100),
            hexrgba: #fff,
            text-contrast: ()
        ),

        root-summaries-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        root-summaries-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300),
            hexrgba: #fff,
            text-contrast: ()
        ),

        row-highlight: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        row-ghost-background: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 50)
        ),

        row-drag-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200)
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light grid schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    header-background

    The table header background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #fff
    header-text-color

    The table header text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    $sorted-header-icon-color

    The sorted table header icon color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    header-border-width

    The border width used for header borders.

    		Number1px
    header-border-style

    The border style used for header borders.

    		Stringsolid
    header-border-color

    The color used for header borders.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)
    ghost-header-text-color

    The dragged header text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    ghost-header-icon-color

    The dragged header icon color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500)
    ghost-header-background

    The dragged header background color.

    		Color#fff
    content-background

    The table body background color.

    		Color#fff
    content-text-color

    The table body text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    row-odd-background

    The background color of odd rows.

    		Color#fff
    row-even-background

    The background color of even rows.

    		Color#fff
    row-odd-text-color

    The text color of odd rows.

    		Colorinherit
    row-even-text-color

    The text color of even rows.

    		Colorinherit
    row-selected-background

    The selected row background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 50), hexrgba: #fff
    row-selected-text-color

    The selected row text color.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 50)
    row-hover-background

    The hover row background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #fff
    row-hover-text-color

    The hover row text color.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('grays', 200)
    row-border-color

    The row bottom border color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300)
    row-highlight

    The grid row highlight color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    pinned-border-width

    The border width of the pinned border.

    		Number2px
    pinned-border-style

    The CSS border style of the pinned border.

    		Stringsolid
    pinned-border-color

    The color of the pinned border.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)
    cell-active-border-color

    The active(focused) cell border color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    cell-selected-background

    The selected cell background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)
    cell-selected-text-color

    The selected cell text color.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('grays', 200)
    resize-line-color

    The table header resize line color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    grouparea-background

    The grid group area background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #fff
    group-row-background

    The grid group row background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #fff
    group-row-selected-background

    The drop area background on drop color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200), hexrgba: #fff
    active-expand-icon-color

    The drop area background on drop color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500)
    active-expand-icon-hover-color

    The drop area background on drop color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    group-label-column-name-text

    The grid group row column name text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    group-label-icon

    The grid group row icon color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    group-label-text

    The grid group row text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    expand-all-icon-color

    The grid header expand all group rows icon color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    expand-all-icon-hover-color

    The grid header expand all group rows icon hover color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    expand-icon-color

    The grid row expand icon color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    expand-icon-hover-color

    The grid row expand icon hover color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    group-count-background

    The grid group row cont badge background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)
    group-count-text-color

    The grid group row cont badge text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    drop-area-text-color

    The drop area text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    drop-area-icon-color

    The drop area icon color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500)
    drop-area-background

    The drop area background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    drop-area-on-drop-background

    The drop area background on drop color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)
    tree-filtered-text-color

    grouping row background color on focus.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500)
    filtering-header-background

    The background color of the filtered column header.

    		Color#fff
    filtering-header-text-color

    The text color color of the filtered column header.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    filtering-row-background

    The background color of the filtering row.

    		Color#fff
    filtering-row-text-color

    The text-color color of the filtering row.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 800)
    body-summaries-background

    The background color of the summary groups located the body.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300), hexrgba: #fff
    body-summaries-text-color

    The text color of the summary groups located the body.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300), hexrgba: #fff, text-contrast: ()
    root-summaries-background

    The background color of the summary groups located the footer.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #fff
    root-summaries-text-color

    The text color of the summary groups located the footer.

    		Mapigx--color: ('grays', 100), hexrgba: #fff, text-contrast: ()
    row-drag-color

    The color of the drag handle.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200))
    row-ghost-background

    The background color of the dragged row.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 50))
    grid-elevation

    The elevation used for the grid.

    		Number2
    drag-elevation

    The elevation used for movable elements (ex. column header).

    		Number5
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for card date.

    		Number1

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-grid

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] _light-icon

    $_light-icon: extend(
    $_default-shape-icon,
    (
        color: currentColor,

        size: rem(24px),

        disabled-color: currentColor
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light icon schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    color

    The icon color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    size

    The icon size.

    		Stringrem(24px)
    disabled-color

    The disabled icon color.

    		ColorcurrentColor

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-icon

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    light-schema

    $light-schema: (
    igx-avatar: $_light-avatar,
    igx-badge: $_light-badge,
    igx-banner: $_light-banner,
    igx-bottom-nav: $_light-bottom-nav,
    igx-button: $_light-button,
    igx-button-group: $_light-button-group,
    igx-calendar: $_light-calendar,
    igx-card: $_light-card,
    igx-carousel: $_light-carousel,
    igx-checkbox: $_light-checkbox,
    igx-chip: $_light-chip,
    igx-column-hiding: $_light-column-hiding,
    igx-combo: $_light-combo,
    igx-dialog: $_light-dialog,
    igx-divider: $_light-divider,
    igx-drop-down: $_light-drop-down,
    igx-expansion-panel: $_light-expansion-panel,
    igx-grid: $_light-grid,
    igx-grid-filtering: $_light-grid-filtering,
    igx-grid-paginator: $_light-grid-pagination,
    igx-grid-summary: $_light-grid-summary,
    igx-grid-toolbar: $_light-grid-toolbar,
    igx-icon: $_light-icon,
    igx-input-group: $_light-input-group,
    igx-list: $_light-list,
    igx-navbar: $_light-navbar,
    igx-navdrawer: $_light-navdrawer,
    igx-overlay: $_light-overlay,
    igx-linear-bar: $_light-progress-linear,
    igx-circular-bar: $_light-progress-circular,
    igx-radio: $_light-radio,
    igx-ripple: $_light-ripple,
    igx-slider: $_light-slider,
    igx-snackbar: $_light-snackbar,
    igx-switch: $_light-switch,
    igx-tabs: $_light-tabs,
    igx-time-picker: $_light-time-picker,
    igx-toast: $_light-toast,
    igx-tooltip: $_light-tooltip
);

    Description

    The default light schema for all components.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    igx-avatar— noneMap$_light-avatar
    igx-badge— noneMap$_light-badge
    igx-banner— noneMap$_light-banner
    igx-bottom-nav— noneMap$_light-bottom-nav
    igx-button— noneMap$_light-button
    igx-button-group— noneMap$_light-button-group
    igx-calendar— noneMap$_light-calendar
    igx-card— noneMap$_light-card
    igx-carousel— noneMap$_light-carousel
    igx-checkbox— noneMap$_light-checkbox
    igx-chip— noneMap$_light-chip
    igx-column-hiding— noneMap$_light-column-hiding
    igx-combo— noneMap$_light-combo
    igx-dialog— noneMap$_light-dialog
    igx-divider— noneMap$_light-divider
    igx-drop-down— noneMap$_light-drop-down
    igx-expansion-panel— noneMap$_light-expansion-panel
    igx-grid— noneMap$_light-grid
    igx-grid-filtering— noneMap$_light-grid-filtering
    igx-grid-paginator— noneMap$_light-grid-pagination
    igx-grid-summary— noneMap$_light-grid-summary
    igx-grid-toolbar— noneMap$_light-grid-toolbar
    igx-icon— noneMap$_light-icon
    igx-input-group— noneMap$_light-input-group
    igx-list— noneMap$_light-list
    igx-navbar— noneMap$_light-navbar
    igx-navdrawer— noneMap$_light-navdrawer
    igx-overlay— noneMap$_light-overlay
    igx-progress-linear— noneMap$_light-progress-linear
    igx-progress-circular— noneMap$_light-progress-circular
    igx-radio— noneMap$_light-radio
    igx-ripple— noneMap$_light-ripple
    igx-slider— noneMap$_light-slider
    igx-snackbar— noneMap$_light-snackbar
    igx-switch— noneMap$_light-switch
    igx-tabs— noneMap$_light-tabs
    igx-time-picker— noneMap$_light-time-picker
    igx-toast— noneMap$_light-toast
    igx-tooltip— noneMap$_light-tooltip

    Used by

    • [function] igx-avatar-theme
    • [function] igx-badge-theme

    [private] _light-input-group

    $_light-input-group: extend(
    $_default-shape-input-group,
    $_default-elevation-input-group,
    (
        idle-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        filled-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 900)
        ),

        focused-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 900)
        ),

        disabled-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500)
        ),

        idle-secondary-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        filled-secondary-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        focused-secondary-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        idle-bottom-line-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        hover-bottom-line-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 900)
        ),

        focused-bottom-line-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        interim-bottom-line-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500),
            rgba: .12
        ),

        disabled-bottom-line-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500)
        ),

        disabled-border-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500),
            rgba: .06
        ),

        box-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),

        box-disabled-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        ),

        border-background: transparent,

        border-disabled-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        ),

        search-background: #fff,

        search-disabled-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        ),

        success-secondary-color: (
            igx-color: ('success')
        ),

        warning-secondary-color: (
            igx-color: ('warn')
        ),

        error-secondary-color: (
            igx-color: ('error')
        ),

        placeholder-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500)
        ),

        disabled-placeholder-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light input-group schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    idle-text-color

    The input text color in the idle state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    filled-text-color

    The input text color in the filled state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 900)
    focused-text-color

    The input text color in the focused state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 900)
    disabled-text-color

    The input text color in the disabled state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500)
    idle-secondary-color

    The label color in the idle state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    filled-secondary-color

    The label color in the filled state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    focused-secondary-color

    The label color in the focused state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    idle-bottom-line-color

    The bottom line and border colors in the idle state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    hover-bottom-line-color

    The bottom line and border colors in the hover state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 900)
    focused-bottom-line-color

    The bottom line and border colors in the focused state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    interim-bottom-line-color

    The bottom line and border colors during the to-focused transition.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500), rgba: .12
    disabled-bottom-line-color

    The bottom line and border colors in the disabled state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500)
    disabled-border-color

    The disabled border color for input groups of type border.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500), rgba: .06
    box-background

    The background color of an input group of type box.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)
    box-disabled-background

    The background color of an input group of type box in the disabled state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    border-background

    The background color of an input group of type border.

    		Colortransparent
    border-disabled-background

    The background color of an input group of type border in the disabled state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    search-background

    The background color of an input group of type search.

    		Color#fff
    search-disabled-background

    The background color of an input group of type search in the disabled state.

    		Colorigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    search-resting-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the resting state of the search input.

    		Number1
    search-hover-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the hover state of the search input.

    		Number2
    search-disabled-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the disabled state of the search input.

    		Number0
    success-secondary-color

    The success color used in the valid state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('success')
    warning-secondary-color

    The warning color used in the warning state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('warn')
    error-secondary-color

    The error color used in the error state.

    		Mapigx-color: ('error')
    box-border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for box input .

    		Number.2 .2 0 0
    border-border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for border input .

    		Number.2
    search-border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for search input .

    		Number.2

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-input-group

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    [private] _light-list

    $_light-list: extend(
    $_default-shape-list,
    (
        background: (
            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),

        header-background: (
            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),

        header-text-color:  (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        item-background: (
            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),

        item-background-hover: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200),
            hexrgba: (#fff)
        ),

        item-background-active: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200),
            hexrgba: (#fff)
        ),

        item-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .74
        ),

        item-text-color-hover: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .74
        ),

        item-text-color-active: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .74
        ),

        item-title-color: currentColor,

        item-title-color-hover: currentColor,

        item-title-color-active: currentColor,

        item-action-color: currentColor,

        item-action-color-hover: currentColor,

        item-action-color-active: currentColor,

        item-subtitle-color: currentColor,

        item-subtitle-color-hover: currentColor,

        item-subtitle-color-active: currentColor,

        item-thumbnail-color: currentColor,

        item-thumbnail-color-hover: currentColor,

        item-thumbnail-color-active: currentColor
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light list schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    background

    The list background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface'
    header-background

    The list header background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface'
    header-text-color

    The list header text color.

    		Colorigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    item-background

    The list item background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface'
    item-background-hover

    The list item hover background.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200), hexrgba: (#fff)
    item-background-active

    The active list item background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200), hexrgba: (#fff)
    item-text-color

    The list item text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .74
    item-text-color-hover

    The list item text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .74
    item-text-color-active

    The active list item text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .74
    item-title-color

    The list item title color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-title-color-hover

    The list item title hover color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-title-color-active

    The list item title active color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-subtitle-color

    The list item subtitle color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-subtitle-color-hover

    The list item subtitle hover color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-subtitle-color-active

    The list item subtitle active color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-action-color

    The list item action color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-action-color-hover

    The list item action hover color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-action-color-active

    The list item action active color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-thumbnail-color

    The list item thumbnail color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-thumbnail-color-hover

    The list item thumbnail hover color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    item-thumbnail-color-active

    The list item thumbnail active color.

    		ColorcurrentColor
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for list component.

    		Number0
    item-border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0-1 to be used for list item.

    		Number0

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-list

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    [private] _light-navbar

    $_light-navbar: extend(
    $_default-shape-navbar,
    $_default-elevation-navbar,
    (
        background: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        idle-icon-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        hover-icon-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),
    ),
);

    Description

    Generates a light navbar schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    $background

    The navbar background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    $text-color

    The navbar text color.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('primary', 500)
    $idle-icon-color

    The navbar idle icon color.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('primary', 500)
    $hover-icon-color

    The navbar hover icon color.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('primary', 500)
    $elevation

    The navbar elevation shadow level.

    		Number4

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-navbar

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    [private] _light-navdrawer

    $_light-navdrawer: extend(
    $_default-shape-navdrawer,
    $_default-elevation-navdrawer,
    (
        background: (
            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),

        border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .14),

        item-header-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .87
        ),

        item-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .54
        ),

        item-icon-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .54
        ),

        item-active-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        item-active-background: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500),
            rgba: .12
        ),

        item-hover-background: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .08
        ),

        item-hover-text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .87
        ),

        item-active-icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        item-hover-icon-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .87
        ),
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light navdrawer schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    background

    The navigation drawer background color.

    		Color#fff
    border-color

    The navigation drawer right border color.

    		Colorrgba(0, 0, 0, .14)
    item-header-text-color

    The header's idle text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .87
    item-text-color

    The item's idle text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .54
    item-icon-color

    The item's icon color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .54
    item-active-text-color

    The item's active text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    item-active-background

    The item's active background color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500), rgba: .12
    item-active-icon-color

    The item's icon active color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    item-hover-background

    The item's hover background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .08
    item-hover-text-color

    The item's hover text color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .87
    item-hover-icon-color

    The item's hover icon color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', text-contrast: (), rgba: .87
    elevation

    The elevation level of the drawer, between 0 - 24.

    		Map16
    border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0 - 36 to be used for the navdrawer component.

    		Number0
    item-border-radius

    The border radius fraction, between 0 - 24 to be used for the navdrawer item.

    		Number.16667

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-navdrawer

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Marin Popov

            igx-color: ('grays', 500)

    )
);

    [private] _light-progress-linear

    $_light-progress-linear: extend(
    $_default-shape-progress,
    (
        track-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        fill-color-default: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        fill-color-danger: (
            igx-color: ('error')
        ),

        fill-color-warning: (
            igx-color: ('warn')
        ),

        fill-color-info: (
            igx-color: ('info')
        ),

        fill-color-success: (
            igx-color: ('success')
        ),

        stripes-color: rgba(#fff, .7),

        text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light progress-linear schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    track-color

    The main track color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300)
    fill-color-default

    The track default fill color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    fill-color-danger

    The track danger fill color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('error')
    fill-color-warning

    The track warning fill color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('warn')
    fill-color-info

    The track info fill color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('info')
    fill-color-success

    The track success fill color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('success')
    stripes-color

    The track stripes color.

    		Colorrgba(#fff, .7)
    text-color

    The track value text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700)

    [private] _light-slider

    $_light-slider: extend(
    $_default-shape-slider,
    (
        track-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        thumb-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),


        label-background-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500),
            hexrgba: ()
        ),

        label-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        disabled-thumb-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400),
            hexrgba: ()
        ),

        base-track-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500),
            rgba: .24
        ),

        disabled-base-track-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light slider schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    track-color

    The color of the track.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    thumb-color

    The color of the thumb.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    label-background-color

    The background color of the bubble label.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    label-text-color

    The text color of the bubble label.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
    disabled-thumb-color

    The thumb color when its disabled.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400), hexrgba: ()
    base-track-color

    The base background color of the track.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500)
    disabled-base-track-color

    The base background color of the track when is disabled.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400)

    [private] _light-switch

    $_light-switch: extend(
    $_default-shape-switch,
    $_default-elevation-switch,
    (
        thumb-on-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        track-on-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500),
            rgba: .5
        ),

        thumb-off-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        track-disabled-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 300)
        ),

        track-off-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        thumb-disabled-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400),
            hexrgba: #fff
        ),

        label-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 900)
        ),

        label-disabled-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 400)
        ),
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light switch schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    thumb-on-color

    The color of the thumb when the switch is on.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    track-on-color

    The color of the track when the switch is on.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500), rgba: .5
    thumb-off-color

    The color of the thumb when the switch is off.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200), hexrgba: #fff
    track-off-color

    The color of the track when the switch is off.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    thumb-disabled-color

    The color of the thumb when the switch is disabled.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 400), hexrgba: #fff
    track-disabled-color

    The color of the track when the switch is disabled.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 300)
    label-color

    The color of the switch label

    		Mapgx-color: ('grays', 900)
    label-disabled-color

    The color of the switch label when the switch is disabled

    		Mapgx-color: ('grays', 400)
    resting-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the resting state.

    		Number2
    hover-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the hover state.

    		Number3
    disabled-elevation

    The elevation level, between 0-24, to be used for the disabled state.

    		Number1
    border-radius-track

    The border radius fraction, between 0-7 to be used for switch track.

    		Number1
    border-radius-thumb

    The border radius fraction, between 0-10 to be used for switch thumb.

    		Number1
    border-radius-ripple

    The border radius fraction, between 0-24 to be used for switch ripple.

    		Number1

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-switch

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    [private] _light-tabs

    $_light-tabs: extend(
    $_default-shape-tabs,
    (
        item-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        item-background: #fff,

        item-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),

        item-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700)
        ),

        item-active-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        item-active-icon-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        item-active-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 200)
        ),

        indicator-color: (
            igx-color: ('primary', 500)
        ),

        button-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 500)
        ),

        button-background: #fff,

        button-hover-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        ),

        button-hover-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 600)
        ),

        tab-ripple-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        ),

        button-ripple-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        )
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light tabs schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    item-text-color

    The color used for the tab text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700)
    item-background

    The background color used for the tabs header.

    		Map#fff
    item-hover-background

    The background used for the tabs on hover.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)
    item-hover-color

    The text color used for the tabs on hover.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700)
    item-active-color

    The color used for the active tabs text.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    item-active-icon-color

    The color used for the active tabs icon.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    item-active-background

    The color used for the active/focused tab background.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 200)
    indicator-color

    The color used for the active tab indicator.

    		Mapigx-color: ('primary', 500)
    button-color

    The color used for the button icon/text color.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 500)
    button-hover-color

    The color used for the button icon/text color on hover.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 600)
    button-background

    The color used for the button background.

    		Color#fff
    button-hover-background

    The color used for the button background on hover.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    tab-ripple-color

    The color used for the button background.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    button-ripple-color

    The color used for the button background on hover.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-tabs

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    • Marin Popov

    [private] _light-time-picker

    $_light-time-picker: extend(
    $_default-shape-time-picker,
    $_default-elevation-time-picker,
    (
        text-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface',
            hexrgba: (),
            text-contrast: (),
            rgba: .38
        ),

        hover-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        selected-text-color: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        active-item-background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 100)
        ),

        header-background: (
            igx-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        header-hour-text-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
        ),

        header-time-period-color: (
            igx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500),
            rgba: .8
        ),

        background-color: (
            igx-color: 'surface'
        ),
    )
);

    Description

    Generates a light time-picker schema.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    text-color

    The text color of a open time picker.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface', hexrgba: (), text-contrast: (), rgba: .38
    hover-text-color

    The hover text color of a open time picker.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    selected-text-color

    The text color of a selected item in time picker.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    active-item-background

    The background color for current item in focused column inside the time picker.

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 100)
    header-background

    The header background color of a time picker.

    		Mapigx-color: ('secondary', 500)
    header-hour-text-color

    The header hour text color of a time picker.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500)
    header-time-period-color

    The header AM/PM text color of a time picker.

    		Mapigx-contrast-color: ('secondary', 500), rgba: .8
    background-color

    The time-picker panel background color.

    		Mapigx-color: 'surface'
    modal-elevation

    The elevation level used for the time picker in modal mode.

    		Number24
    dropdown-elevation

    The elevation level used for the time picker in dropdown mode.

    		Number8

    Used by

    • [variable] _dark-time-picker

    See

    • [variable] default-palette

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    [private] _light-tooltip

    $_light-tooltip: extend(
    $_default-shape-tooltip,
    (
        background: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700),
            hexrgba: (),
            rgba: .9
        ),

        text-color: (
            igx-color: ('grays', 700),
            hexrgba: (),
            rgba: .9,
            text-contrast: ()
        ),

        roundness: rem(4px)
    )
);

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700), hexrgba: (), rgba: .9
    text-color

    		Mapigx-color: ('grays', 700), hexrgba: (), rgba: .9, text-contrast: ()

    		Number.1

    light-round-schema

    $light-round-schema: (
    igx-avatar: extend($_light-avatar, $_round-shape-avatar),
    igx-badge: extend($_light-badge, $_round-shape-badge),
    igx-banner: extend($_light-banner, $_round-shape-banner),
    igx-bottom-nav: extend($_light-bottom-nav, $_round-shape-bottom-nav),
    igx-button: extend($_light-button, $_round-shape-button),
    igx-button-group: extend($_light-button-group, $_round-shape-button-group),
    igx-calendar: extend($_light-calendar, $_round-shape-calendar),
    igx-card: extend($_light-card, $_round-shape-card),
    igx-carousel: extend($_light-carousel, $_round-shape-carousel),
    igx-checkbox: extend($_light-checkbox, $_round-shape-checkbox),
    igx-chip: extend($_light-chip, $_round-shape-chip),
    igx-column-hiding: extend($_light-column-hiding, $_round-shape-column-hiding),
    igx-combo: extend($_light-combo, $_round-shape-combo),
    igx-dialog: extend($_light-dialog, $_round-shape-dialog),
    igx-divider: extend($_light-divider, $_round-shape-divider),
    igx-drop-down: extend($_light-drop-down, $_round-shape-drop-down),
    igx-expansion-panel: extend($_light-expansion-panel, $_round-shape-expansion-panel),
    igx-grid: extend($_light-grid, $_round-shape-grid),
    igx-grid-filtering: extend($_light-grid-filtering, $_round-shape-grid-filtering),
    igx-grid-paginator: extend($_light-grid-pagination, $_round-shape-grid-pagination),
    igx-grid-summary: extend($_light-grid-summary, $_round-shape-grid-summary),
    igx-grid-toolbar: extend($_light-grid-toolbar, $_round-shape-tooltip),
    igx-icon: extend($_light-icon, $_round-shape-icon),
    igx-input-group: extend($_light-input-group, $_round-shape-input-group),
    igx-list: extend($_light-list, $_round-shape-list),
    igx-navbar: extend($_light-navbar, $_round-shape-navbar),
    igx-navdrawer: extend($_light-navdrawer, $_round-shape-navdrawer),
    igx-overlay: extend($_light-overlay, $_round-shape-overlay),
    igx-linear-bar: extend($_light-progress-linear, $_default-shape-progress),
    igx-circular-bar: extend($_light-progress-circular, $_default-shape-progress),
    igx-radio: extend($_light-radio, $_round-shape-radio),
    igx-ripple: extend($_light-ripple, $_round-shape-ripple),
    igx-slider: extend($_light-slider, $_round-shape-slider),
    igx-snackbar: extend($_light-snackbar, $_round-shape-snackbar),
    igx-switch: extend($_light-switch, $_round-shape-switch),
    igx-tabs: extend($_light-tabs, $_round-shape-tabs),
    igx-time-picker: extend($_light-time-picker, $_round-shape-time-picker),
    igx-toast: extend($_light-toast, $_round-shape-toast),
    igx-tooltip: extend($_light-tooltip, $_round-shape-tooltip)
);

    Description

    The default light schema for all components.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    igx-avatar— noneMap$_light-avatar
    igx-badge— noneMap$_light-badge
    igx-banner— noneMap$_light-banner
    igx-bottom-nav— noneMap$_light-bottom-nav
    igx-button— noneMap$_light-button
    igx-button-group— noneMap$_light-button-group
    igx-calendar— noneMap$_light-calendar
    igx-card— noneMap$_light-card
    igx-carousel— noneMap$_light-carousel
    igx-checkbox— noneMap$_light-checkbox
    igx-chip— noneMap$_light-chip
    igx-column-hiding— noneMap$_light-column-hiding
    igx-combo— noneMap$_light-combo
    igx-dialog— noneMap$_light-dialog
    igx-divider— noneMap$_light-divider
    igx-drop-down— noneMap$_light-drop-down
    igx-expansion-panel— noneMap$_light-expansion-panel
    igx-grid— noneMap$_light-grid
    igx-grid-filtering— noneMap$_light-grid-filtering
    igx-grid-paginator— noneMap$_light-grid-pagination
    igx-grid-summary— noneMap$_light-grid-summary
    igx-grid-toolbar— noneMap$_light-grid-toolbar
    igx-icon— noneMap$_light-icon
    igx-input-group— noneMap$_light-input-group
    igx-list— noneMap$_light-list
    igx-navbar— noneMap$_light-navbar
    igx-navdrawer— noneMap$_light-navdrawer
    igx-overlay— noneMap$_light-overlay
    igx-progress-linear— noneMap$_light-progress-linear
    igx-progress-circular— noneMap$_light-progress-circular
    igx-radio— noneMap$_light-radio
    igx-ripple— noneMap$_light-ripple
    igx-slider— noneMap$_light-slider
    igx-snackbar— noneMap$_light-snackbar
    igx-switch— noneMap$_light-switch
    igx-tabs— noneMap$_light-tabs
    igx-time-picker— noneMap$_light-time-picker
    igx-toast— noneMap$_light-toast
    igx-tooltip— noneMap$_light-tooltip

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    light-square-schema

    $light-square-schema: (
    igx-avatar: extend($_light-avatar, $_square-shape-avatar),
    igx-badge: extend($_light-badge, $_square-shape-badge),
    igx-banner: extend($_light-banner, $_square-shape-banner),
    igx-bottom-nav: extend($_light-bottom-nav, $_square-shape-bottom-nav),
    igx-button: extend($_light-button, $_square-shape-button),
    igx-button-group: extend($_light-button-group, $_square-shape-button-group),
    igx-calendar: extend($_light-calendar, $_square-shape-calendar),
    igx-card: extend($_light-card, $_square-shape-card),
    igx-carousel: extend($_light-carousel, $_square-shape-carousel),
    igx-checkbox: extend($_light-checkbox, $_square-shape-checkbox),
    igx-chip: extend($_light-chip, $_square-shape-chip),
    igx-column-hiding: extend($_light-column-hiding, $_square-shape-column-hiding),
    igx-combo: extend($_light-combo, $_square-shape-combo),
    igx-dialog: extend($_light-dialog, $_square-shape-dialog),
    igx-divider: extend($_light-divider, $_square-shape-divider),
    igx-drop-down: extend($_light-drop-down, $_square-shape-drop-down),
    igx-expansion-panel: extend($_light-expansion-panel, $_square-shape-expansion-panel),
    igx-grid: extend($_light-grid, $_square-shape-grid),
    igx-grid-filtering: extend($_light-grid-filtering, $_square-shape-grid-filtering),
    igx-grid-paginator: extend($_light-grid-pagination, $_square-shape-grid-pagination),
    igx-grid-summary: extend($_light-grid-summary, $_square-shape-grid-summary),
    igx-grid-toolbar: extend($_light-grid-toolbar, $_square-shape-tooltip),
    igx-icon: extend($_light-icon, $_square-shape-icon),
    igx-input-group: extend($_light-input-group, $_square-shape-input-group),
    igx-list: extend($_light-list, $_square-shape-list),
    igx-navbar: extend($_light-navbar, $_square-shape-navbar),
    igx-navdrawer: extend($_light-navdrawer, $_square-shape-navdrawer),
    igx-overlay: extend($_light-overlay, $_square-shape-overlay),
    igx-linear-bar: extend($_light-progress-linear, $_default-shape-progress),
    igx-circular-bar: extend($_light-progress-circular, $_default-shape-progress),
    igx-radio: extend($_light-radio, $_square-shape-radio),
    igx-ripple: extend($_light-ripple, $_square-shape-ripple),
    igx-slider: extend($_light-slider, $_square-shape-slider),
    igx-snackbar: extend($_light-snackbar, $_square-shape-snackbar),
    igx-switch: extend($_light-switch, $_square-shape-switch),
    igx-tabs: extend($_light-tabs, $_square-shape-tabs),
    igx-time-picker: extend($_light-time-picker, $_square-shape-time-picker),
    igx-toast: extend($_light-toast, $_square-shape-toast),
    igx-tooltip: extend($_light-tooltip, $_square-shape-tooltip)
);

    Description

    The default light schema for all components.

    Type

    {map}

    Map structure

    {Map} key Name{Map} key Description{Map} key Type{Map} key Value
    igx-avatar— noneMap$_light-avatar
    igx-badge— noneMap$_light-badge
    igx-banner— noneMap$_light-banner
    igx-bottom-nav— noneMap$_light-bottom-nav
    igx-button— noneMap$_light-button
    igx-button-group— noneMap$_light-button-group
    igx-calendar— noneMap$_light-calendar
    igx-card— noneMap$_light-card
    igx-carousel— noneMap$_light-carousel
    igx-checkbox— noneMap$_light-checkbox
    igx-chip— noneMap$_light-chip
    igx-column-hiding— noneMap$_light-column-hiding
    igx-combo— noneMap$_light-combo
    igx-dialog— noneMap$_light-dialog
    igx-divider— noneMap$_light-divider
    igx-drop-down— noneMap$_light-drop-down
    igx-expansion-panel— noneMap$_light-expansion-panel
    igx-grid— noneMap$_light-grid
    igx-grid-filtering— noneMap$_light-grid-filtering
    igx-grid-paginator— noneMap$_light-grid-pagination
    igx-grid-summary— noneMap$_light-grid-summary
    igx-grid-toolbar— noneMap$_light-grid-toolbar
    igx-icon— noneMap$_light-icon
    igx-input-group— noneMap$_light-input-group
    igx-list— noneMap$_light-list
    igx-navbar— noneMap$_light-navbar
    igx-navdrawer— noneMap$_light-navdrawer
    igx-overlay— noneMap$_light-overlay
    igx-progress-linear— noneMap$_light-progress-linear
    igx-progress-circular— noneMap$_light-progress-circular
    igx-radio— noneMap$_light-radio
    igx-ripple— noneMap$_light-ripple
    igx-slider— noneMap$_light-slider
    igx-snackbar— noneMap$_light-snackbar
    igx-switch— noneMap$_light-switch
    igx-tabs— noneMap$_light-tabs
    igx-time-picker— noneMap$_light-time-picker
    igx-toast— noneMap$_light-toast
    igx-tooltip— noneMap$_light-tooltip

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    themes

    functions

    igx-avatar-theme

    @function igx-avatar-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $icon-background: null, $icon-color: null, $initials-background: null, $initials-color: null, $image-background: null) { ... }

    Description

    If only background color is specified, text/icon color will be assigned automatically to a contrasting color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $icon-background

    The background color used for avatars of type icon.

    		Colornull
    $icon-color

    The icon color used for avatars of type icon.

    		Colornull
    $initials-background

    The background color used for avatars of type initials.

    		Colornull
    $initials-color

    The text color used for avatars of type initials.

    		Colornull
    $image-background

    The background color used for avatars of type image.

    		Colornull

    Example

    Change the background and icon colors in icon avatars

    $my-avatar-theme: igx-avatar-theme($icon-background: black, $icon-color: white);
// Pass the theme to the igx-avatar component mixin
@include igx-avatar($my-avatar-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] extend

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-badge-theme

    @function igx-badge-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $icon-color: null, $text-color: null, $border-color: null, $background-color: null, $disable-shadow: true, $disable-border: true, $shadow: null, $border-radius: null) { ... }

    Description

    If only background color is specified, text/icon color will be assigned automatically to a contrasting color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $icon-color

    The icon color used.

    		Colornull
    $text-color

    The text color used.

    		Colornull
    $border-color

    The border color used.

    		Colornull
    $background-color

    The background color used.

    		Colornull
    $disable-shadow

    Sets the badge shadow visibility.

    		Booltrue
    $disable-border

    Sets the badge border visibility.

    		Booltrue
    $shadow

    Sets a shadow to be used for the badge.

    		Box-shadownull
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for badge component.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Change the text and icon colors in a badge

    $my-badge-theme: igx-badge-theme($icon-color: black, $background-color: white);
// IE Supported theme - Pass the theme to the igx-badge component mixin
@include igx-badge($my-badge-theme);

// Theming using css variables (not supported in IE11):
@include igx-css-vars($my-badge-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [variable] elevations
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] rem
    • [function] round-borders
    • [variable] elevations

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-banner-theme

    @function igx-banner-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $banner-background: null, $banner-message-color: null, $banner-border-color: null, $banner-illustration-background: null, $banner-illustration-color: null) { ... }

    Description

    If only background color is specified, text/icon color will be assigned automatically to a contrasting color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $banner-background

    The background color used banner background.

    		Colornull
    $banner-message-color

    The color used for banner label.

    		Colornull
    $banner-border-color

    The border color used banner border.

    		Colornull
    $banner-illustration-background

    The background color used for banner illustration.

    		Colornull
    $banner-illustration-color

    The color used banner illustration.

    		Colornull

    Example

    Change the background in banner

    $my-banner-theme: igx-banner-theme($banner-background: #000);
// Pass the theme to the igx-banner component mixin
@include igx-banner($my-banner-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] extend

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    igx-bottom-nav-theme

    @function igx-bottom-nav-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $background: null, $idle-item-color: null, $active-item-color: null, $shadow: null) { ... }

    Description

    If only background color is specified, the idle item color will be assigned automatically to a contrasting color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $background

    The background color used for the toast.

    		Colornull
    $idle-item-color

    The text-color used for the idle color.

    		Colornull
    $active-item-color

    The text-color used for the active color.

    		Colornull
    $shadow

    Sets a shadow to be used for the bar.

    		Box-shadownull

    Example

    Set a custom background color

    $my-tabbar-theme: igx-toast-theme($background: black);
// Pass the theme to the igx-bottom-nav component mixin
@include igx-bottom-nav($my-tabbar-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [variable] elevations

    Used by

    • [mixin] igx-bottom-nav

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-button-group-theme

    @function igx-button-group-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $shadow: null, $item-text-color: null, $item-background: null, $item-border-color: null, $item-hover-text-color: null, $item-hover-background: null, $disabled-text-color: null, $disabled-background-color: null, $item-selected-text-color: null, $item-selected-background: null, $item-selected-border-color: null, $item-selected-hover-background: null, $border-radius: null) { ... }

    Description

    If only background color is specified, text/icon color will be assigned automatically to a contrasting color. Does not apply for disabled state colors.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $shadow

    The shadow to be applied for the button group.

    		Box-shadownull
    $item-text-color

    The text color for button group items.

    		Colornull
    $item-background

    The background color for button group items .

    		Colornull
    $item-border-color

    The border color between button group items.

    		Colornull
    $item-hover-text-color

    The hover text color for button group items.

    		Colornull
    $item-hover-background

    The hover background color for button group items.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-text-color

    The text/icon color for a disabled item in the button group.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-background-color

    The background color for a disabled item in the button group.

    		Colornull
    $item-selected-text-color

    The text color for a selected item in the button group.

    		Colornull
    $item-selected-background

    The background color for a selected item in the button group.

    		Colornull
    $item-selected-border-color

    The border color for a selected item from the button group.

    		Colornull
    $item-selected-hover-background

    The background color for a selected item in hover or focus state in the button group.

    		Colornull
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for button-group component.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Change the background, text, and border colors

    $my-button-group-theme: igx-button-group-theme(
  $item-text-color: white,
  $item-background: rgba(0, 0, 0, .8),
  $item-border-color: #dadada
);
// Pass the theme to the igx-button-group component mixin
@include igx-button-group($my-button-group-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [function] round-borders
    • [variable] elevations

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    igx-button-theme

    @function igx-button-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $flat-border-radius: null, $raised-border-radius: null, $outlined-border-radius: null, $fab-border-radius: null, $icon-border-radius: null, $flat-background: null, $flat-text-color: null, $flat-hover-background: null, $flat-hover-text-color: null, $flat-focus-background: null, $flat-focus-text-color: null, $outlined-background: null, $outlined-text-color: null, $outlined-outline-color: null, $outlined-disabled-outline-color: null, $outlined-hover-background: null, $outlined-hover-text-color: null, $outlined-focus-background: null, $outlined-focus-text-color: null, $raised-background: null, $raised-text-color: null, $raised-hover-background: null, $raised-hover-text-color: null, $raised-focus-background: null, $raised-focus-text-color: null, $raised-resting-shadow: null, $raised-hover-shadow: null, $raised-focus-shadow: null, $fab-background: null, $fab-text-color: null, $fab-hover-background: null, $fab-hover-text-color: null, $fab-focus-background: null, $fab-focus-text-color: null, $fab-resting-shadow: null, $fab-hover-shadow: null, $fab-focus-shadow: null, $icon-color: null, $icon-hover-color: null, $icon-background: null, $icon-hover-background: null, $icon-focus-color: null, $icon-focus-background: null, $disabled-color: null, $disabled-background: null) { ... }

    Description

    If only background color is specified, text/icon color will be assigned automatically to a contrasting color. Does not apply for disabled state colors.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for the component theme.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $flat-border-radius

    The border radius used for flat button.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $raised-border-radius

    The border radius used for raised button.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $outlined-border-radius

    The border radius used for outlined button.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $fab-border-radius

    The border radius used for fab button.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $icon-border-radius

    The border radius used for icon button.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $flat-background

    The background color of a flat button.

    		Colornull
    $flat-text-color

    The idle text color of a flat button.

    		Colornull
    $flat-hover-background

    The hover background color of a flat button.

    		Colornull
    $flat-hover-text-color

    The hover text color of a flat button.

    		Colornull
    $flat-focus-background

    The focus background color of a flat button.

    		Colornull
    $flat-focus-text-color

    The focus text color of a flat button.

    		Colornull
    $outlined-background

    The background color of an outlined button.

    		Colornull
    $outlined-text-color

    The idle text color of an outlined button.

    		Colornull
    $outlined-outline-color

    The outline color of an outlined button.

    		Colornull
    $outlined-disabled-outline-color

    The outline color of an outlined, disabled button.

    		Colornull
    $outlined-hover-background

    The hover background color of an outlined button.

    		Colornull
    $outlined-hover-text-color

    The hover text color of an outlined button.

    		Colornull
    $outlined-focus-background

    The focus background color of an outlined button.

    		Colornull
    $outlined-focus-text-color

    The focus text color of an outlined button.

    		Colornull
    $raised-background

    The background color of a raised button.

    		Colornull
    $raised-text-color

    The idle text color of a raised button.

    		Colornull
    $raised-hover-background

    The hover background of a raised button.

    		Colornull
    $raised-hover-text-color

    The hover text color of a raised button.

    		Colornull
    $raised-focus-background

    The focus background color of a raised button.

    		Colornull
    $raised-focus-text-color

    The focus text color of a raised button.

    		Colornull
    $raised-resting-shadow

    The shadow color of the raised button in its resting state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $raised-hover-shadow

    The shadow color of the raised button in its hover state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $raised-focus-shadow

    The shadow color of the raised button in its focus state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $fab-background

    The background color of a floating action button.

    		Colornull
    $fab-text-color

    The text color of a floating action button.

    		Colornull
    $fab-hover-background

    The hover background color of a floating action button.

    		Colornull
    $fab-hover-text-color

    The hover text color of a floating action button.

    		Colornull
    $fab-focus-background

    The focus background color of floating action button.

    		Colornull
    $fab-focus-text-color

    The focus text color of a floating action button.

    		Colornull
    $fab-resting-shadow

    The shadow color of the floating action button in its resting state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $fab-hover-shadow

    The shadow color of the floating action button in its hover state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $fab-focus-shadow

    The shadow color of the floating action button in its focus state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $icon-color

    The icon color of an icon button.

    		Colornull
    $icon-hover-color

    The hover icon color of an icon button.

    		Colornull
    $icon-background

    The background color of the an icon button.

    		Colornull
    $icon-hover-background

    The hover background color of an icon button.

    		Colornull
    $icon-focus-color

    The focus icon color of an icon button.

    		Colornull
    $icon-focus-background

    The focus background color an icon button.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-color

    The disabled text/icon color of a button.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-background

    The disabled background color of raised, fab, or icon buttons.

    		Colornull

    Example

    Change the background and text colors in raised buttons

    $my-button-theme: igx-button-theme(
  $raised-text-color: white,
  $raised-background: black
);
// Pass the theme to the igx-button component mixin
@include igx-button($my-button-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [variable] elevations
    • [function] round-borders

    Authors

    • Marin Popov

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-calendar-theme

    @function igx-calendar-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $content-background: null, $content-text-color: null, $header-background: null, $header-text-color: null, $picker-arrow-color: null, $picker-arrow-hover-color: null, $picker-text-color: null, $picker-text-hover-color: null, $inactive-text-color: null, $weekend-text-color: null, $year-current-text-color: null, $month-current-text-color: null, $year-hover-text-color: null, $month-hover-text-color: null, $month-hover-background: null, $date-selected-background: null, $date-selected-text-color: null, $date-current-text-color: null, $date-hover-background: null, $date-special-background: null, $date-special-text-color: null, $date-disabled-text-color: null, $border-radius: null, $date-border-radius: null, $month-border-radius: null) { ... }

    Description

    If only header background color is specified, that color will be used as the leading color for all accented elements, such as:

    • current date color
    • selected date background
    • picker elements hover colors
    • year/month hover/selected colors If only background colors are specified, text/icon colors will be assigned automatically to a contrasting color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $content-background

    The main content background color.

    		Colornull
    $content-text-color

    The main content text color.

    		Colornull
    $header-background

    The header background color.

    		Colornull
    $header-text-color

    The header text color.

    		Colornull
    $picker-arrow-color

    The idle picker arrow color.

    		Colornull
    $picker-arrow-hover-color

    The picker hover arrow color.

    		Colornull
    $picker-text-color

    The idle picker month/year color.

    		Colornull
    $picker-text-hover-color

    The hover picker month/year color.

    		Colornull
    $inactive-text-color

    The text color for weekday labels and other month dates.

    		Colornull
    $weekend-text-color

    The text color for weekend days.

    		Colornull
    $year-current-text-color

    The text color for the current/selected year.

    		Colornull
    $month-current-text-color

    The text color for the current/selected month.

    		Colornull
    $year-hover-text-color

    The year hover text color.

    		Colornull
    $month-hover-text-color

    The month hover text color.

    		Colornull
    $month-hover-background

    The month hover background color.

    		Colornull
    $date-selected-background

    The background color for the selected date.

    		Colornull
    $date-selected-text-color

    The text color for the selected date.

    		Colornull
    $date-current-text-color

    The text color for the current date.

    		Colornull
    $date-hover-background

    The hover date background color.

    		Colornull
    $date-special-background

    The background color used for special dates.

    		Colornull
    $date-special-text-color

    The text color used for special dates.

    		Colornull
    $date-disabled-text-color

    The text color for disabled dates.

    		Colornull
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for the outline of the calendar.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $date-border-radius

    The border radius used for the outline outline of the date.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $month-border-radius

    The border radius used for the outline outline of the month.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Change the header and content background colors

    $my-calendar-theme: igx-calendar-theme(
  $header-background: purple,
  $content-background: black
);
// Pass the theme to the igx-calendar component mixin
@include igx-calendar($my-calendar-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] round-borders
    • [function] extend

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-card-theme

    @function igx-card-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $background: null, $outline-color: null, $header-text-color: null, $subtitle-text-color: null, $content-text-color: null, $actions-text-color: null, $resting-shadow: null, $hover-shadow: null, $border-radius: null) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $background

    The card background color.

    		Colornull
    $outline-color

    The color of the outline for outlined type cards.

    		Colornull
    $header-text-color

    The text color of the card title.

    		Colornull
    $subtitle-text-color

    The text color of the card subtitle.

    		Colornull
    $content-text-color

    The text color of the card content.

    		Colornull
    $actions-text-color

    The text color of the card buttons.

    		Colornull
    $resting-shadow

    The shadow of the card in its resting state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $hover-shadow

    The shadow of the card in its hover state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for card component.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Change the background and content text colors in card

    $my-card-theme: igx-card-theme(
  $background: #fff,
  $content-text-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .8)
);
// Pass the theme to the igx-card component mixin
@include igx-card($my-card-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [variable] elevations
    • [function] round-borders

    Authors

    • Marin Popov

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-carousel-theme

    @function igx-carousel-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $button-background: null, $button-hover-background: null, $button-arrow-color: null, $button-hover-arrow-color: null, $indicator-dot-color: null, $indicator-border-color: null, $indicator-active-border-color: null, $disable-button-shadow: true, $border-radius: null) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $button-background

    The previous/next buttons idle background color.

    		Colornull
    $button-hover-background

    The previous/next buttons hover background color.

    		Colornull
    $button-arrow-color

    The previous/next buttons idle arrow color.

    		Colornull
    $button-hover-arrow-color

    The previous/next buttons hover arrow color.

    		Colornull
    $indicator-dot-color

    The active indicator dot color.

    		Colornull
    $indicator-border-color

    The idle indicator border color.

    		Colornull
    $indicator-active-border-color

    The active indicator border color.

    		Colornull
    $disable-button-shadow

    Show shadow underneath the previous/next buttons.

    		Booltrue
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for carousel component.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Change the previous/next button colors

    $my-carousel-theme: igx-carousel-theme(
  $button-background: black,
  $button-hover-background: white
);
// Pass the carousel theme to the igx-carousel component mixin
@include igx-carousel($my-carousel-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette

    igx-checkbox-theme

    @function igx-checkbox-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $label-color: null, $empty-color: null, $fill-color: null, $tick-color: null, $disabled-color: null, $border-radius: null, $border-radius-ripple: null) { ... }

    Description

    Checkbox Theme

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $label-color

    The text color used for the label text.

    		Colornull
    $empty-color

    The unchecked border color.

    		Colornull
    $fill-color

    The checked border and fill colors.

    		Colornull
    $tick-color

    The checked mark color.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-color

    The disabled border and fill colors.

    		Colornull
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for checkbox component.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $border-radius-ripple

    The border radius used for checkbox ripple. Set to light when the surrounding area is dark.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Change the checked fill color

    $my-checkbox-theme: igx-checkbox-theme($fill-color: magenta);
// Pass the theme to the igx-checkbox component mixin
@include igx-checkbox($my-checkbox-theme);

    • [variable] light-schema

    Generates a drop-down theme.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette

    		Colornull

    		Colornull
    $disabled-item-text-color

    		Colornull
    $shadow

    		Box-shadownull

    		Border-radiusnull

    The background color when a summary item is on focus.

    		Colornull
    $label-color

    The summaries label color.

    		Colornull

    		Colornull

    		Colornull

    		Colornull
    $pinned-border-color

    The border color of the summary panel.

    		Colornull
    $label-hover-color

    The summaries hover label color.

    		Colornull

    Example

  $background-color: black,
  $label-color: white
);
