    igx-grid-theme

    @function igx-grid-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $header-background: null, $header-text-color: null, $header-border-width: null, $header-border-style: null, $header-border-color: null, $sorted-header-icon-color: null, $content-background: null, $content-text-color: null, $ghost-header-text-color: null, $ghost-header-icon-color: null, $ghost-header-background: null, $row-odd-background: null, $row-even-background: null, $row-odd-text-color: null, $row-even-text-color: null, $row-selected-background: null, $row-selected-text-color: null, $row-hover-background: null, $row-hover-text-color: null, $row-border-color: null, $pinned-border-width: null, $pinned-border-style: null, $pinned-border-color: null, $cell-active-border-color: null, $cell-selected-background: null, $cell-selected-text-color: null, $cell-editing-background: null, $cell-edited-value-color: null, $edit-mode-color: null, $edited-row-indicator: null, $resize-line-color: null, $drop-indicator-color: null, $grouparea-background: null, $group-row-background: null, $group-row-selected-background: null, $group-label-column-name-text: null, $group-label-icon: null, $group-label-text: null, $expand-all-icon-color: null, $expand-all-icon-hover-color: null, $expand-icon-color: null, $expand-icon-hover-color: null, $active-expand-icon-color: null, $active-expand-icon-hover-color: null, $group-count-background: null, $group-count-text-color: null, $drop-area-text-color: null, $drop-area-icon-color: null, $drop-area-background: null, $drop-area-on-drop-background: null, $filtering-header-background: null, $filtering-header-text-color: null, $filtering-row-background: null, $filtering-row-text-color: null, $tree-filtered-text-color: null, $body-summaries-background: null, $body-summaries-text-color: null, $root-summaries-background: null, $root-summaries-text-color: null, $row-highlight: null, $grid-shadow: null, $drag-shadow: null, $row-ghost-background: null, $row-drag-color: null, $drop-area-border-radius: null) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $header-background

    The table header background color.

    		Colornull
    $header-text-color

    The table header text color.

    		Colornull
    $header-border-width

    The border width used for header borders.

    		Stringnull
    $header-border-style

    The border style used for header borders.

    		Stringnull
    $header-border-color

    The color used for header borders.

    		Colornull
    $sorted-header-icon-color

    The sort icon color when sorted.

    		Colornull
    $content-background

    The table body background color.

    		Colornull
    $content-text-color

    The table body text color.

    		Colornull
    $ghost-header-text-color

    The dragged header text color.

    		Colornull
    $ghost-header-icon-color

    The dragged header icon color.

    		Colornull
    $ghost-header-background

    The dragged header background color.

    		Colornull
    $row-odd-background

    The background color of odd rows.

    		Colornull
    $row-even-background

    The background color of even rows.

    		Colornull
    $row-odd-text-color

    The text color of odd rows.

    		Colornull
    $row-even-text-color

    The text color of even rows.

    		Colornull
    $row-selected-background

    The selected row background color.

    		Colornull
    $row-selected-text-color

    The selected row text color.

    		Colornull
    $row-hover-background

    The hover row background color.

    		Colornull
    $row-hover-text-color

    The hover row text color.

    		Colornull
    $row-border-color

    The row bottom border color.

    		Colornull
    $pinned-border-width

    The border width of the pinned border.

    		Stringnull
    $pinned-border-style

    The CSS border style of the pinned border.

    		Stringnull
    $pinned-border-color

    The color of the pinned border.

    		Colornull
    $cell-active-border-color

    The border color for the currently active(focused) cell.

    		Colornull
    $cell-selected-background

    The selected cell background color.

    		Colornull
    $cell-selected-text-color

    The selected cell text color.

    		Colornull
    $cell-editing-background

    The background color of the cell being edited.

    		Colornull
    $cell-edited-value-color

    The text color of a sell that has been edited.

    		Colornull
    $edit-mode-color

    The color applied around the row when in editing mode.

    		Colornull
    $edited-row-indicator

    The color applied to the edited row indicator line.

    		Colornull
    $resize-line-color

    The table header resize line color.

    		Colornull
    $drop-indicator-color

    The color applied to the line between the columns when dragging a column.

    		Colornull
    $grouparea-background

    The grid group area background color.

    		Colornull
    $group-row-background

    The grid group row background color.

    		Colornull
    $group-row-selected-background

    The drop area background on drop color.

    		Colornull
    $group-label-column-name-text

    The grid group row column name text color.

    		Colornull
    $group-label-icon

    The grid group row icon color.

    		Colornull
    $group-label-text

    The grid group row text color.

    		Colornull
    $expand-all-icon-color

    The grid header expand all group rows icon color.

    		Colornull
    $expand-all-icon-hover-color

    The grid header expand all group rows icon hover color.

    		Colornull
    $expand-icon-color

    The grid row expand icon color.

    		Colornull
    $expand-icon-hover-color

    		Colornull
    $active-expand-icon-color

    		Colornull
    $active-expand-icon-hover-color

    		Colornull
    $group-count-background

    		Colornull
    $group-count-text-color

    The grid group row cont badge text color.

    		Colornull
    $drop-area-text-color

    The drop area text color.

    		Colornull
    $drop-area-icon-color

    The drop area icon color.

    		Colornull
    $drop-area-background

    The drop area background color.

    		Colornull
    $drop-area-on-drop-background

    The drop area background on drop color.

    		Colornull
    $filtering-header-background

    The background color of the filtered column header.

    		Colornull
    $filtering-header-text-color

    		Colornull

    $filtering-row-text-color

    		Colornull
    $tree-filtered-text-color

    grouping row background color on focus.

    		Colornull
    $body-summaries-background

    The background color of the summary groups located the body.

    		Colornull
    $body-summaries-text-color

    The text color of the summary results located the body.

    		Colornull
    $root-summaries-background

    The background color of the summary groups located the footer.

    		Colornull
    $root-summaries-text-color

    The text color of the summary results located the footer.

    		Colornull
    $row-highlight

    The grid row highlight indication color.

    		Colornull
    $grid-shadow

    The shadow of the grid.

    		Box-shadownull
    $drag-shadow

    The shadow used for movable elements (ex. column headers).

    		Box-shadownull
    $row-ghost-background

    The dragged row background color.

    		Colornull
    $row-drag-color

    The row drag handle color.

    		Colornull
    $drop-area-border-radius

    The border radius used for column drop area.

    		Border-radiusnull

    igx-icon-theme

    @function igx-icon-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $color: null, $size: null, $disabled-color: null) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $color

    The icon color.

    		Colornull
    $size

    The icon size.

    		Stringnull
    $disabled-color

    The disabled icon color.

    		Colornull

    Example

    Change the icon color

    $my-icon-theme: igx-icon-theme($color: orange);
// Pass the theme to the igx-icon component mixin
@include igx-icon($my-icon-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-input-group-theme

    @function igx-input-group-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $idle-text-color: null, $filled-text-color: null, $focused-text-color: null, $disabled-text-color: null, $idle-secondary-color: null, $filled-secondary-color: null, $focused-secondary-color: null, $idle-bottom-line-color: null, $hover-bottom-line-color: null, $focused-bottom-line-color: null, $interim-bottom-line-color: null, $disabled-bottom-line-color: null, $disabled-border-color: null, $box-background: null, $box-disabled-background: null, $border-background: null, $border-disabled-background: null, $search-background: null, $search-disabled-background: null, $search-resting-shadow: null, $search-hover-shadow: null, $search-disabled-shadow: null, $success-secondary-color: null, $warning-secondary-color: null, $error-secondary-color: null, $box-border-radius: null, $border-border-radius: null, $search-border-radius: null) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $idle-text-color

    The input text color in the idle state.

    		Colornull
    $filled-text-color

    The input text color in the filled state.

    		Colornull
    $focused-text-color

    The input text color in the focused state.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-text-color

    The input text color in the disabled state.

    		Colornull
    $idle-secondary-color

    The label color in the idle state.

    		Colornull
    $filled-secondary-color

    The label color in the filled state.

    		Colornull
    $focused-secondary-color

    The label color in the focused state.

    		Colornull
    $idle-bottom-line-color

    The bottom line and border colors in the idle state.

    		Colornull
    $hover-bottom-line-color

    The bottom line and border colors in the hover state.

    		Colornull
    $focused-bottom-line-color

    The bottom line and border colors in the focused state.

    		Colornull
    $interim-bottom-line-color

    The bottom line and border colors during the to-focused transition.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-bottom-line-color

    The bottom line and border colors in the disabled state.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-border-color

    The disabled border color for input groups of type border.

    		Colornull
    $box-background

    The background color of an input group of type box.

    		Colornull
    $box-disabled-background

    The background color of an input group of type box in the disabled state.

    		Colornull
    $border-background

    The background color of an input group of type border.

    		Colornull
    $border-disabled-background

    The background color of an input group of type border in the disabled state.

    		Colornull
    $search-background

    The background color of an input group of type search.

    		Colornull
    $search-disabled-background

    The background color of an input group of type search in the disabled state.

    		Colornull
    $search-resting-shadow

    The shadow color of an input group of type search in its resting state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $search-hover-shadow

    The shadow color of an input group of type search in its hover state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $search-disabled-shadow

    The shadow color of an input group of type search in its disabled state.

    		Box-shadownull
    $success-secondary-color

    The success color used in the valid state.

    		Colornull
    $warning-secondary-color

    The warning color used in the warning state.

    		Colornull
    $error-secondary-color

    The error color used in the error state.

    		Colornull
    $box-border-radius

    The border radius used for box input.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $border-border-radius

    The border radius used for border input.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $search-border-radius

    The border radius used for search input.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Change the focused border and label colors

    $my-input-group-theme: igx-input-group-theme($focused-secondary-color: pink, $focused-bottom-line-color: pink);
// Pass the theme to the igx-input-group component mixin
@include igx-input-group($my-input-group-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [variable] elevations
    • [function] round-borders

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-list-theme

    igx-navbar-theme

    @function igx-navbar-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $background: null, $text-color: null, $shadow: null, $idle-icon-color: null, $hover-icon-color: null, $disable-shadow: true) { ... }

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    		Map$light-schema

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations

    		Colornull

    The navbar idle icon color.

    		Colornull
    $hover-icon-color

    The navbar hover icon color.

    		Colornull
    $disable-shadow

    Sets the navbar shadow visibility.

    		Booltrue

    Example

    igx-navdrawer-theme

    @function igx-navdrawer-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $background: null, $border-color: null, $item-header-text-color: null, $item-text-color: null, $item-icon-color: null, $item-active-text-color: null, $item-active-background: null, $item-active-icon-color: null, $item-hover-background: null, $item-hover-text-color: null, $item-hover-icon-color: null, $shadow: null, $border-radius: null, $item-border-radius: null) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $background

    The navigation drawer background color.

    		Colornull
    $border-color

    The navigation drawer right border color.

    		Colornull
    $item-header-text-color

    The header's idle text color.

    		Colornull
    $item-text-color

    The item's idle text color.

    		Colornull
    $item-icon-color

    The item's icon color.

    		Colornull
    $item-active-text-color

    The item's active text color.

    		Colornull
    $item-active-background

    The item's active background color.

    		Colornull
    $item-active-icon-color

    The item's icon active color.

    		Colornull
    $item-hover-background

    The item's hover background color.

    		Colornull
    $item-hover-text-color

    The item's hover text color.

    		Colornull
    $item-hover-icon-color

    The item's hover icon color.

    		Colornull
    $shadow

    Sets a custom shadow to be used by the drawer.

    		Colornull
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for the navdrawer.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $item-border-radius

    The border radius used for the navdrawer item.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Change the background and item colors

    $navdrawer-theme: igx-navdrawer-theme(
  $background: #2d313a,
  $item-active-background: #ecc256,
  $item-icon-color: #ecc256
);
// Pass the theme to the igx-navdrawer component mixin
@include igx-navdrawer($navdrawer-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [variable] elevations
    • [function] round-borders

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-radio-theme

    @function igx-radio-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $label-color: null, $empty-color: null, $fill-color: null, $disabled-color: null) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $label-color

    The text color used for the label text.

    		Colornull
    $empty-color

    The unchecked border color.

    		Colornull
    $fill-color

    The checked border and dot colors.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-color

    The disabled border and dot colors.

    		Colornull

    Change the checked dot and border colors

    $my-radio-theme: igx-radio-theme($fill-color: magenta);
// Pass the theme to the igx-radio component mixin
@include igx-radio($my-radio-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette

    Authors

    igx-ripple-theme

    @function igx-ripple-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $color: null) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $color

    The color of the ripple.

    		Colornull

    Example

    Change the color

    $my-ripple-theme: igx-ripple-theme($color: yellow);
// Pass the theme to the igx-ripple component mixin
igx-ripple($my-ripple-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend

    Used by

    • [mixin] igx-checkbox
    • [mixin] igx-radio
    • [mixin] igx-switch
    • [mixin] igx-tabs

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-slider-theme

    @function igx-slider-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $track-color: null, $thumb-color: null, $label-background-color: null, $label-text-color: null, $disabled-thumb-color: null, $base-track-color: null, $disabled-base-track-color: null) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $track-color

    The color of the track.

    		Colornull
    $thumb-color

    The color of the thumb.

    		Colornull
    $label-background-color

    The background color of the bubble label.

    		Colornull
    $label-text-color

    The text color of the bubble label.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-thumb-color

    The thumb color when its disabled.

    		Colornull
    $base-track-color

    The base background color of the track.

    		Colornull
    $disabled-base-track-color

    The base background color of the track when is disabled.

    		Colornull

    Example

    Set custom track and thumb on colors

    $my-slider-theme: igx-slider-theme($thumb-on-color: black, $track-on-color: yellow);
// Pass the theme to the igx-slider component mixin
@include igx-slider($my-slider-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] text-contrast

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-snackbar-theme

    @function igx-snackbar-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $background: null, $text-color: null, $button-color: null, $shadow: null, $border-radius: null) { ... }

    Description

    If you specify a background color, but do not specify colors for either the button or the text, their colors will be set automatically to a contrasting color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $background

    The background color used in the snackbar.

    		Colornull
    $text-color

    The text color used in the snackbar.

    		Colornull
    $button-color

    The button color used in the snackbar.

    		Colornull
    $shadow

    Sets a shadow to be used for the snackbar.

    		Box-shadownull
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for the snackbar component.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Set a custom background color

    $my-snackbar-theme: igx-snackbar-theme($background: white);
// Pass the theme to the igx-bottom-nav component mixin
@include igx-snackbar($my-snackbar-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [variable] elevations
    • [function] round-borders

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-switch-theme

    @function igx-switch-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $thumb-on-color: null, $track-on-color: null, $thumb-off-color: null, $track-off-color: null, $thumb-disabled-color: null, $track-disabled-color: null, $label-color: null, $label-disabled-color: null, $resting-shadow: null, $hover-shadow: null, $disabled-shadow: null, $border-radius-track: null, $border-radius-thumb: null, $border-radius-ripple: null) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $thumb-on-color

    The color of the thumb when the switch is on.

    		Colornull
    $track-on-color

    The color of the track when the switch is on.

    		Colornull
    $thumb-off-color

    The color of the thumb when the switch is off.

    		Colornull
    $track-off-color

    The color of the track when the switch is off.

    		Colornull
    $thumb-disabled-color

    The color of the thumb when the switch is disabled.

    		Colornull
    $track-disabled-color

    The color of the track when the switch is disabled.

    		Colornull
    $label-color

    The color of the switch label

    		Colornull
    $label-disabled-color

    The color of the switch label when the switch is disabled

    		Colornull
    $resting-shadow

    The shadow used for the thumb in resting state of the switch.

    		Box-shadownull
    $hover-shadow

    The shadow used for the thumb in hover state of the switch.

    		Box-shadownull
    $disabled-shadow

    The shadow used for the thumb in disable state of the switch.

    		Box-shadownull
    $border-radius-track

    The border radius used for switch track.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $border-radius-thumb

    The border radius used for switch thumb.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $border-radius-ripple

    The border radius used for switch ripple.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Set custom track and thumb on colors

    $my-switch-theme: igx-toast-theme($thumb-on-color: black, $track-on-color: yellow);
// Pass the theme to the igx-bottom-nav component mixin
@include igx-switch($my-switch-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [variable] elevations

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-tabs-theme

    @function igx-tabs-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $item-text-color: null, $item-background: null, $item-hover-background: null, $item-hover-color: null, $item-active-color: null, $item-active-icon-color: null, $item-active-background: null, $indicator-color: null, $button-color: null, $button-hover-color: null, $button-background: null, $button-hover-background: null, $tab-ripple-color: null, $button-ripple-color: null, $disable-shadow: true) { ... }

    Description

    If only background color is specified, the idle item color will be assigned automatically to a contrasting color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $item-text-color

    The color used for the tab text color.

    		Colornull
    $item-background

    The background color used for the tabs header.

    		Colornull
    $item-hover-background

    The background used for the tabs on hover.

    		Colornull
    $item-hover-color

    The text color used for the tabs on hover.

    		Colornull
    $item-active-color

    The color used for the active tabs text.

    		Colornull
    $item-active-icon-color

    The color used for the active tabs icon.

    		Colornull
    $item-active-background

    The color used for the active/focused tab background.

    		Colornull
    $indicator-color

    The color used for the active tab indicator.

    		Colornull
    $button-color

    The color used for the button icon/text color.

    		Colornull
    $button-hover-color

    The color used for the button icon/text color on hover.

    		Colornull
    $button-background

    The color used for the button background.

    		Colornull
    $button-hover-background

    The color used for the button background on hover.

    		Colornull
    $tab-ripple-color

    The color used for the button background.

    		Colornull
    $button-ripple-color

    The color used for the button background on hover.

    		Colornull
    $disable-shadow

    Sets the tabs header shadow visibility.

    		Booltrue

    Example

    Set a custom background color

    $my-tabs-theme: igx-tabs-theme(
   $item-background: orange
 );
// Pass the theme to the igx-tabs component mixin
@include igx-tabs($my-tabs-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] extend
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [function] text-contrast

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    igx-time-picker-theme

    @function igx-time-picker-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $elevations: $elevations, $text-color: null, $hover-text-color: null, $selected-text-color: null, $active-item-background: null, $header-background: null, $header-hour-text-color: null, $header-time-period-color: null, $background-color: null, $modal-shadow: null, $dropdown-shadow: null, $border-radius: null, $active-item-border-radius: null) { ... }

    Description

    If only background color is specified, text/icon color will be assigned automatically to a contrasting color. Does not apply for disabled state colors.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $elevations

    The elevations (shadows) map to be used.

    		Map$elevations
    $text-color

    The text color of a open time picker.

    		Colornull
    $hover-text-color

    The hover text color of a open time picker.

    		Colornull
    $selected-text-color

    The text color of a selected item in time picker.

    		Colornull
    $active-item-background

    The background color for current item in focused column inside the time picker.

    		Colornull
    $header-background

    The header background color of a time picker.

    		Colornull
    $header-hour-text-color

    The header hour text color of a time picker.

    		Colornull
    $header-time-period-color

    The header AM/PM text color of a time picker.

    		Colornull
    $background-color

    The time-picker panel background color.

    		Colornull
    $modal-shadow

    The custom shadow to be used for the time picker in modal mode.

    		Box-shadownull
    $dropdown-shadow

    The custom shadow to be used for the time picker in dropdown mode.

    		Box-shadownull
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for the outline of the picker.

    		Border-radiusnull
    $active-item-border-radius

    The border radius used for the outline of the currently active item (hours, minutes, AM/PM).

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Change the background and text colors in time picker

    $my-time-picker-theme: igx-time-picker-theme(
  $text-color: white,
  $background-color: black
);
// Pass the theme to the igx-time-picker component mixin
@include igx-time-picker($my-time-picker-theme);

    Requires

    • [variable] default-palette
    • [variable] light-schema
    • [function] apply-palette
    • [function] text-contrast
    • [function] igx-elevation
    • [variable] elevations
    • [function] extend

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    igx-toast-theme

    @function igx-toast-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $background: null, $text-color: null, $border-radius: null) { ... }

    Description

    If only background color is specified, the text-color will be assigned automatically to a contrasting color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $background

    The background color used for the toast.

    		Colornull
    $text-color

    The text-color used for the toast.

    		Colornull
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for the toast component.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Set a custom background color

    $my-toast-theme: igx-toast-theme($background: green);
// Pass the theme to the igx-toast component mixin
@include igx-toast($my-toast-theme);

    igx-tooltip-theme

    @function igx-tooltip-theme($palette: $default-palette, $schema: $light-schema, $background: null, $text-color: null, $border-radius: null) { ... }

    Description

    Returns a map containing all style properties related to the theming the tooltip directive.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The palette used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$default-palette
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the component.

    		Map$light-schema
    $background

    The background color of the tooltip.

    		Colornull
    $text-color

    The text color of the tooltip.

    		Colornull
    $border-radius

    The border radius used for the tooltip component.

    		Border-radiusnull

    Example

    Change the tooltip background

    $my-tooltip-theme: igx-tooltip-theme($background: magenta);
// Pass the theme to the igx-tooltip component mixin
@include igx-tooltip($my-checkbox-theme);

    igx-icon

    @mixin igx-icon($theme) { ... }

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $theme

    The theme used to style the component.

    		Map— none

    Requires

    • [mixin] igx-root-css-vars

    Used by

    igx-theme

    @mixin igx-theme($palette, $schema: $light-schema, $exclude: ( ), $legacy-support) { ... }

    Description

    Generates an Ignite UI for Angular global theme.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    An igx-palette to be used by the global theme.

    		Map— none
    $schema

    The schema used as basis for styling the components.

    		Map$light-schema
    $exclude

    A list of igx components to be excluded from the global theme styles.

    		List( )
    $legacy-support

    Turn off support for IE11, allowing you to use css variables to style components.

    		Boolean— none

    Requires

    • [variable] components
    • [variable] default-palette
    • [function] is-component
    • [mixin] igx-avatar
    • [mixin] igx-badge
    • [mixin] igx-button
    • [mixin] igx-button-group
    • [mixin] igx-calendar
    • [mixin] igx-card
    • [mixin] igx-carousel
    • [mixin] igx-checkbox
    • [mixin] igx-date-picker
    • [mixin] igx-dialog
    • [mixin] igx-drop-down
    • [mixin] igx-expansion-panel
    • [mixin] igx-grid
    • [mixin] igx-grid-summary
    • [mixin] igx-grid-paginator
    • [mixin] igx-icon
    • [mixin] igx-input-group
    • [mixin] igx-list
    • [mixin] igx-navbar
    • [mixin] igx-navdrawer
    • [mixin] igx-progress-linear
    • [mixin] igx-progress-circular
    • [mixin] igx-radio
    • [mixin] igx-ripple
    • [mixin] igx-slider
    • [mixin] igx-snackbar
    • [mixin] igx-switch
    • [mixin] igx-tabs
    • [mixin] igx-bottom-nav
    • [mixin] igx-toast

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-light-theme

    @mixin igx-light-theme($palette, $exclude: ( ), $legacy-support) { ... }

    Description

    Creates a global theme that can be used with light backgrounds.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    An igx-palette to be used by the global theme.

    		Map— none
    $exclude

    A list of igx components to be excluded from the global theme styles.

    		List( )
    $legacy-support

    Turn off support for IE11, allowing you to use css variables to style components.

    		Boolean— none

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    typography

    mixins

    igx-banner-typography

    @mixin igx-banner-typography($type-scale, $categories: (label: 'body-2')) { ... }

    Description

    Adds typography styles for the igx-banner component. Uses the 'body-2' category from the typographic scale.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $type-scale

    A typographic scale as produced by igx-type-scale.

    		Map— none
    $categories

    The categories from the typographic scale used for type styles.

    		Map(label: 'body-2')

    Requires

    • [mixin] igx-type-style

    • Marin Popov

    Requires

    • [mixin] igx-type-style

    Author

    • Marin Popov

    igx-toast-typography

    @mixin igx-toast-typography($type-scale, $categories: (text: 'body-2')) { ... }

    Description

    Adds typography styles for the igx-toast component. Uses the 'body-2' category from the typographic scale.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $type-scale

    A typographic scale as produced by igx-type-scale.

    		Map— none
    $categories

    The categories from the typographic scale used for type styles.

    		Map(text: 'body-2')

    Requires

    • [mixin] igx-type-style

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-tooltip-typography

    @mixin igx-tooltip-typography($type-scale, $categories: (text-desktop: null, text-mobile: 'body-2')) { ... }

    Description

    Adds typography styles for the igx-tooltip component. Uses the 'body-2' category from the typographic scale for mobile tooltips and custom typography for desktop tooltips.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $type-scale

    A typographic scale as produced by igx-type-scale.

    		Map— none
    $categories

    The categories from the typographic scale used for type styles.

    		Map(text-desktop: null, text-mobile: 'body-2')

    Requires

    • [function] rem
    • [mixin] igx-type-style

    Authors

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    • Marin Popov

    igx-type-style

    @mixin igx-type-style($scale, $category) { ... }

    Description

    Assigns type scale category config properties as style rules wherever this mixin is included.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $scale

    A type scale map reference as produces by igx-type-scale.

    		Map— none
    $category

    The type scale category config you want to use as CSS style rules.

    		String— none

    Example

    Add the h1 styles to custom CSS selector.

    .fancy-h1 {
   @include igx-type-style($default-type-scale, 'h1');
   font-family: 'GT Walsheim';
   color: mediumvioletred;
}

    Used by

    • [mixin] igx-banner-typography
    • [mixin] igx-bottom-nav-typography
    • [mixin] igx-button-typography
    • [mixin] igx-calendar-typography
    • [mixin] igx-card-typography
    • [mixin] igx-checkbox-typography
    • [mixin] igx-chip-typography
    • [mixin] igx-column-hiding-typography
    • [mixin] igx-dialog-typography
    • [mixin] igx-drop-down-typography
    • [mixin] igx-expansion-panel-typography
    • [mixin] _excel-filtering-typography
    • [mixin] igx-input-group-typography
    • [mixin] igx-list-typography
    • [mixin] igx-navbar-typography
    • [mixin] igx-navdrawer-typography
    • [mixin] igx-radio-typography
    • [mixin] igx-snackbar-typography
    • [mixin] igx-switch-typography
    • [mixin] igx-tabs-typography
    • [mixin] igx-time-picker-typography
    • [mixin] igx-toast-typography
    • [mixin] igx-tooltip-typography

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-typography

    @mixin igx-typography($font-family: "'Titillium Web', sans-serif", $type-scale: $default-type-scale, $base-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .74)) { ... }

    Description

    Adds typography styles for h1-h6, paragraph and creates custom typography class selectors. The produces styles are based on the passed type scale. If omitted the default-type-scale will be used.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $font-family

    The font family to be used across all typographic elements.

    		String"'Titillium Web', sans-serif"
    $type-scale

    A type scale map as produced by igx-type-scale.

    		Map$default-type-scale
    $base-color

    The default color used across all typographic elements (Components define their own text colors).

    		Stringrgba(0, 0, 0, .74)

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    functions

    igx-type-style

    @function igx-type-style($font-family: null, $font-size: null, $font-weight: null, $line-height: null, $letter-spacing: null, $text-transform: null) { ... }

    Description

    In interface-like type style map.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $font-family

    The font size of the type style.

    		Stringnull
    $font-size

    The font size of the type style.

    		Stringnull
    $font-weight

    The font weight of the type style.

    		Number or Stringnull
    $line-height

    The line height of the type style.

    		Number or Stringnull
    $letter-spacing

    The letter spacing of the type style.

    		Number or Stringnull
    $text-transform

    The text-transform property of the type style.

    		Stringnull

    Returns

    Map —

    A map of all defined type style properties.

    Used by

    • [function] igx-type-scale

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-type-scale

    @function igx-type-scale($h1: null, $h2: null, $h3: null, $h4: null, $h5: null, $h6: null, $subtitle-1: null, $subtitle-2: null, $body-1: null, $body-2: null, $button: null, $caption: null, $overline: null) { ... }

    Description

    Creates a type scale map containing type style definitions for:

    • h1
    • h2
    • h3
    • h4
    • h5
    • h6
    • subtitle-1
    • subtitle-2
    • body-1
    • body-2
    • button
    • caption
    • overline

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $h1

    A map containing type style properties as produced by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles h1 elements and elements with igx-font-h1 class.

    		Mapnull
    $h2

    A map containing type style properties as produced by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles h2 elements and elements with igx-font-h2 class.

    		Mapnull
    $h3

    A map containing type style properties as produced by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles h3 elements and elements with igx-font-h3 class.

    		Mapnull
    $h4

    A map containing type style properties as produced by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles h4 elements and elements with igx-font-h4 class.

    		Mapnull
    $h5

    A map containing type style properties as produced by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles h5 elements and elements with igx-font-h5 class.

    		Mapnull
    $h6

    A map containing type style properties as produced by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles h6 elements and elements with igx-font-h6 class.

    		Mapnull
    $subtitle-1

    A map containing type style properties as produces by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles elements with igx-font-subtitle-1 class.

    		Mapnull
    $subtitle-2

    A map containing type style properties as produces by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles elements with igx-font-subtitle-2 class.

    		Mapnull
    $body-1

    A map containing type style properties as produces by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles elements with igx-font-body-1 class.

    		Mapnull
    $body-2

    A map containing type style properties as produces by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles elements with igx-font-body-2 class.

    		Mapnull
    $button

    A map containing type style properties as produces by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles elements with igx-button class.

    		Mapnull
    $caption

    A map containing type style properties as produces by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles elements with igx-font-caption class.

    		Mapnull
    $overline

    A map containing type style properties as produces by the igx-type-style function. This type scale styles elements with igx-font-overline class.

    		Mapnull

    Returns

    Map —

    A map of all defined type scales.

    Requires

    • [function] igx-type-style

    Used by

    • [variable] default-type-scale

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    igx-type-scale-category

    @function igx-type-scale-category($scale, $category) { ... }

    Description

    Get type scale category config.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $scale

    A type scale map reference as produces by igx-type-scale.

    		Map— none
    $category

    The scale category you want config for. For instance - 'h1';

    		String— none

    Returns

    Map —

    The config map for the selected category in the type scale.

    Example

    Get the type scale category config for the h1 scale.

    $h1-type-scale: igx-type-scale-category($default-type-scale, 'h1');

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    variables

    default-type-scale

    $default-type-scale: igx-type-scale() !default;

    Type

    Map - the default type scale.

    Map structure

    Map - The default type scale. key NameMap - The default type scale. key DescriptionMap - The default type scale. key TypeMap - The default type scale. key Value
    h1— noneMap— none
    h1.font-size— noneStringrem(96px)
    h1.font-weight— noneNumber300
    h1.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(-1.5px)
    h1.line-height— noneStringrem(112px)
    h1.text-transform— noneStringnone
    h2— noneMap— none
    h2.font-size— noneStringrem(60px)
    h2.font-weight— noneNumber300
    h2.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(-.5px)
    h2.line-height— noneStringrem(71px)
    h2.text-transform— noneStringnone
    h3— noneMap— none
    h3.font-size— noneStringrem(48px)
    h3.font-weight— noneNumber400
    h3.letter-spacing— noneStringnormal
    h3.line-height— noneStringrem(57px)
    h3.text-transform— noneStringnone
    h4— noneMap— none
    h4.font-size— noneStringrem(34px)
    h4.font-weight— noneNumber400
    h4.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(.25px)
    h4.line-height— noneStringrem(40px)
    h4.text-transform— noneStringnone
    h5— noneMap— none
    h5.font-size— noneStringrem(24px)
    h5.font-weight— noneNumber600
    h5.letter-spacing— noneStringnormal
    h5.line-height— noneStringrem(28px)
    h5.text-transform— noneStringnone
    h6— noneMap— none
    h6.font-size— noneStringrem(20px)
    h6.font-weight— noneNumber400
    h6.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(.15px)
    h6.line-height— noneStringrem(24px)
    h6.text-transform— noneStringnone
    subtitle-1— noneMap— none
    subtitle-1.font-size— noneStringrem(16px)
    subtitle-1.font-weight— noneNumber400
    subtitle-1.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(.15px)
    subtitle-1.line-height— noneStringrem(24px)
    subtitle-1.text-transform— noneStringnone
    subtitle-2— noneMap— none
    subtitle-2.font-size— noneStringrem(14px)
    subtitle-2.font-weight— noneNumber600
    subtitle-2.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(-.1px)
    subtitle-2.line-height— noneStringrem(28px)
    subtitle-2.text-transform— noneStringnone
    body-1— noneMap— none
    body-1.font-size— noneStringrem(16px)
    body-1.font-weight— noneNumber400
    body-1.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(.5px)
    body-1.line-height— noneStringrem(28px)
    body-1.text-transform— noneStringnone
    body-2— noneMap— none
    body-2.font-size— noneStringrem(14px)
    body-2.font-weight— noneNumber400
    body-2.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(.25px)
    body-2.line-height— noneStringrem(20px)
    body-2.text-transform— noneStringnone
    button— noneMap— none
    button.font-size— noneStringrem(14px)
    button.font-weight— noneNumber600
    button.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(.4px)
    button.line-height— noneStringrem(16px)
    button.text-transform— noneStringuppercase
    caption— noneMap— none
    caption.font-size— noneStringrem(12px)
    caption.font-weight— noneNumber400
    caption.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(.4px)
    caption.line-height— noneStringrem(16px)
    caption.text-transform— noneStringnone
    overline— noneMap— none
    overline.font-size— noneStringrem(10px)
    overline.font-weight— noneNumber400
    overline.letter-spacing— noneStringrem(1.5px)
    overline.line-height— noneStringrem(16px)
    overline.text-transform— noneStringuppercase

    Requires

    • [function] igx-type-scale

    Links

    • Material Type System.

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] map-clean

    @function map-clean($map) { ... }

    Description

    Removes all null key-value pairs from the map

    		Map— none

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    --var

    @function --var($map, $key) { ... }

    Description

    Returns a CSS property value. It could return either css '--var' or a plain string value based on theme configuration.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $map

    The source theme to be used to read values from.

    		Map— none
    $key

    A key from the theme map to assign as value to the property.

    		String— none

    Returns

    String —

    The value of the key in the passed map, or the name of key concatenated with the key name.

    Example

    Assign the color property in a rule-set to a value from the default avatar theme.

    %igx-avatar-icon {
  color: --var($avatar-theme, 'icon-color');
}
// If legacy-support is off, it will produce the following:
// %igx-avatar-icon {
//   color: var(--igx-avatar-icon-color);
// }
// otherwise, it will return the value for key 'icon-color' in the '$avatar-theme';

    Used by

    • [mixin] igx-avatar
    • [mixin] igx-badge
    • [mixin] igx-banner
    • [mixin] igx-bottom-nav
    • [mixin] igx-button-group
    • [mixin] igx-button
    • [mixin] igx-calendar
    • [mixin] igx-card
    • [mixin] igx-carousel
    • [mixin] igx-checkbox
    • [mixin] igx-chip
    • [mixin] igx-column-hiding
    • [mixin] igx-combo
    • [mixin] igx-dialog
    • [mixin] igx-divider
    • [mixin] igx-drop-down
    • [mixin] igx-expansion-panel
    • [mixin] igx-grid-paginator
    • [mixin] igx-grid-summary
    • [mixin] igx-grid-toolbar
    • [mixin] _excel-filtering
    • [mixin] igx-grid
    • [mixin] igx-icon
    • [mixin] igx-input-group
    • [mixin] igx-list
    • [mixin] igx-navbar
    • [mixin] igx-navdrawer
    • [mixin] igx-overlay
    • [mixin] igx-progress-linear
    • [mixin] igx-progress-circular
    • [mixin] igx-radio

    [private] str-split

    @function str-split($string, $separator) { ... }

    Description

    Splits a string into a list by a given separator.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $string

    The string to split.

    		String— none
    $separator

    The string separator to split the string by.

    		String— none

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] resolve-value

    @function resolve-value($ctx, $extra: null) { ... }

    Description

    Returns a value for a given instruction map, where the keys of the map are the names of the functions to be called, and the value for a given key is the arguments the function should be called with. The instruction set is executed left-to-right. The output of the first instruction is then passed as input to the next, and so on.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $ctx

    The instruction map to be used.

    		Map— none
    $extra

    Additional arguments to be passed during function calls. Will only be applied for igx-color and igx-contrast-color functions.

    		List or Mapnull

    Example

    Resolve igx-color and apply 80% opacity

    $instructions: (
  igx-color: ('primary', 500),
  rgba: .2
);
// $some-palette is a palette we pass as extra arguments
$resolved-color: resolve-value($instructions, $some-palette);

    Used by

    • [function] apply-palette

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] random-color

    @function random-color() { ... }

    Description

    Returns a random color.

    Parameters

    None.

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] apply-palette

    @function apply-palette($schema, $palette) { ... }

    Description

    Applies an igx-palette to a given theme schema.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $schema

    A theme schema.

    		Map— none
    $palette

    An igx-palette map.

    		Map— none

    Returns

    Map —

    A map with the resolved palette values.

    Example

    Apply an igx-palette to theme schema

    $custom-palette: igx-palette($primary: red, $secondary: blue);
$custom-schema: (
  my-color: (
     igx-color: ('primary', 800),
     rgba: .5
  ),
  roundness: 5px
);
$theme: apply-palette($custom-schema, $custom-palette); // A map with palette values resolved.

    Requires

    • [function] extend
    • [function] resolve-value

    Used by

    • [function] igx-avatar-theme
    • [function] igx-badge-theme
    • [function] igx-banner-theme
    • [function] igx-bottom-nav-theme
    • [function] igx-button-group-theme
    • [function] igx-button-theme

    • [function] igx-grid-paginator-theme
    • [function] igx-grid-summary-theme
    • [function] igx-grid-toolbar-theme
    • [function] igx-grid-theme

    [private] is-root

    @function is-root() { ... }

    Description

    Returns true if the scope where it's called is the root of the document.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Check if the current scope is root

    @mixin smart-mixin() {
  $scope: if(is-root(), ':root', '&');

  #{$scope} {
    /* style rules here */
  }
}

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    @function fraction-clamp() { ... }

    Description

    Returns calc value between given min and max values

    Parameters

    None.

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] round-borders

    @function round-borders() { ... }

    Description

    If the value is unitless, returns value or list of values between 0 and 1 where the 0 is the minimum and 1 is the maximum If the value is NOT unitless return the value or list of values with the unit you pass

    Parameters

    None.

    Used by

    • [function] igx-badge-theme
    • [function] igx-button-group-theme
    • [function] igx-button-theme
    • [function] igx-calendar-theme

    [private] lighten-color

    @function lighten-color($color, $amount) { ... }

    Description

    A thin wrapper around Sass' lighten function to allow pass-through for values other than those of type color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $color

    The color to be lightened.

    		Color— none
    $amount

    The percent value by which the color will be lightened.

    		Percent— none

    Returns

    Color or Any —

    The modified color as produced by the lighten function. If the value passed is not a color, then the passed value will be returned.

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] darken-color

    @function darken-color($color, $amount) { ... }

    Description

    A thin wrapper around Sass' darken function to allow pass-through for values other than those of type color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $color

    The color to be lightened.

    		Color— none
    $amount

    The percent value by which the color will be lightened.

    		Percent— none

    Returns

    Color or Any —

    The modified color as produced by the lighten function. If the value passed is not a color, then the passed value will be returned.

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    Description

    Hides the element from the DOM.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Sample usage

    input[type="checkbox"] {
  @include hide-default();
}

    linear-gradient

    @mixin linear-gradient($direction, $color-stops) { ... }

    Description

    Generates a linear gradient.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $direction

    The direction of the gradient.

    		String— none
    $color-stops

    A list of color stops to be used in the gradient.

    		List— none

    Example

    Sample usage

    .bozo {
  background: @include linear-gradient("to right", red, orange);
}

    Output

    The CSS representation of linear-gradient.

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] gen-color-class

    @mixin gen-color-class($name, $variant, $prefix, $prefix) { ... }

    Description

    Generates a CSS class name for a color from a given name, variant, prefix and suffix

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $name

    The main class name.

    		String— none
    $variant

    An additional string to be attached to the main class name.

    		String— none
    $prefix

    A prefix to be attached to the name and variant string.

    		String— none
    $prefix

    A suffix to be attached to the name and variant string.

    		String— none

    Used by

    • [mixin] gen-color-classes

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] gen-color-classes

    @mixin gen-color-classes($prop, $prefix, $suffix) { ... }

    Description

    Generates CSS class names for all colors from the color palette for a given property, with optional prefix and suffix attached to the class name.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $prop

    The CSS property to assign the palette color to.

    		String— none
    $prefix

    A prefix to be attached to the class name.

    		String— none
    $suffix

    A suffix to be attached to the class name.

    		String— none

    Example

    Generate background classes with colors from the palette.

    // Will generate class names like
// .my-primary-500-bg { ... };
@include gen-color-classes(
  $prop: 'background-color',
  $prefix: 'my', $suffix: 'bg'
);

    Requires

    • [mixin] gen-color-class

    Used by

    • [mixin] igx-color-classes

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] css-vars-from-palette

    @mixin css-vars-from-palette($palette) { ... }

    Description

    Generates CSS variables for a given palette.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $palette

    The igx palette to use to generate css variables for.

    		Map— none

    Example

    Generate css variables for the $default-palette.

    @include css-vars-from-palette($default-palette);

    Used by

    [private] igx-color-classes

    @mixin igx-color-classes($prop, $prefix: null, $suffix: igx) { ... }

    Description

    Generates CSS class names for all colors from the color palette for a given property, with optional prefix and suffix attached to the class name.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $prop

    The CSS property to assign the palette color to.

    		String— none
    $prefix

    A prefix to be attached to the class name.

    		Stringnull
    $suffix

    A suffix to be attached to the class name.

    		Stringigx

    Example

    Generate background classes with colors from the palette.

    // Will generate class names like
// .igx-primary-500-bg { ... };
@include igx-color-classes(
  $prop: 'background-color',
  $suffix: 'bg'
);

    Requires

    • [mixin] gen-color-classes

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] css-vars-from-theme

    @mixin css-vars-from-theme($theme) { ... }

    Description

    Parses a map of key value pairs from component themes to css variables.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $theme

    The component theme to be used to generate css variables.

    		Map— none

    Example

    Convert theme colors to css variables.

    $my-theme: igx-avatar-theme($icon-color: red);
:root {
  @include css-vars-from-theme($my-theme);
}

    Used by

    • [mixin] igx-root-css-vars
    • [mixin] igx-css-vars

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    [private] igx-root-css-vars

    @mixin igx-root-css-vars($theme) { ... }

    [private] igx-scope

    @mixin igx-scope($parent) { ... }

    Description

    Scopes CSS rules to a predefined top-level parent selector. Respects specificity and selector scopes.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $parent

    The selector to be used as top level scope.

    		String— none

    Example

    Apply mixin style rules only when '.igx-typography' selector is present.

    @mixin igx-card-typography {
   @include igx-scope('.igx-typography') {
     // style rules...
   }
}

// Later
.my-selector {
  @include igx-card-typography();
}

// Generated CSS
// .igx-typography .my-selector {
//    ...styles rules as output by igx-card-typography mixin
// }

    Author

    • Simeon Simeonoff

    Sassdoc dev theme - vx.x.x
